review_text: Great location close to hurricane ridge and nearby town (port angles). Has Tesla EV charging. Cabin was clean with heater and loved the jaccuzi. Overall best place to relax for the weekend.
Our stay was very enjoyable, quiet, and peaceful surroundings! A lot to do inside of the home on the rainy days.
Thanks so much for hosting us. Wonderful, quiet setting.
Loved my stay here. It was a perfect location. It was peaceful and quiet, and still close enough to town. Hosts were attentive and made they're home so cozy. thank you!
This place is a dream location and the most beautiful place to relax after a day of hiking.

What a beautiful location, the hosts thought of everything a traveler could need. Plenty of info about the town and surrounding activities. The cabin was very clean and inviting. We enjoyed relaxing in the hot tub and using the outdoor fireplace and watching the stars. This was a perfect home base for exploring the Olympic Peninsula! Thank you for sharing this special place with us.
Great little cabin with hiking trails on site. Very clean and decorated nicely. Also very private! You can get to town in about 8 minutes.
The best Airbnb that I have ever stayed at. The views are stunning, the home is beautiful, the hot tub was so relaxing. I’ll be telling all my friends about this place and plan on returning as well.
Great spot, beautiful home, super helpful and enjoyable amenities. A little slice of heaven.

We loved our time at the cabin! The surroundings were so beautiful and the details in the cabin were so thoughtful. Plenty of space for a family to have a wonderful time. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook!

The hosts were amazing and super responsive! From the moment we walked in, the smell hit me first (like fall was made into a candle) and it was the most welcoming and warm home I’ve ever stepped in.
Sitting in the hot tub with the snow falling, fire crackling, and your best friends next to you? A weekend you’ll never forget. I will be thinking about this cabin for the rest of days and recommending it to anyone looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Absolutely great stay!

It is the most incredible, hidden gem of a cabin! The night we stayed, snow began to fall just as we settled into the cedar hot tub. The morning dawn shown on a blanket of white snow. I couldn’t think of a better place to enjoy a trip to Olympic National Park!

This is a wonderful home in a special location. Close to town, yet remote and peaceful. Every detail has been thought through, making for a very well appointed and comfortable home. We love a clean and comfortable home and this house met every expectation. We loved how cozy, warm and welcoming the house is, yet free of clutter. The wood stove and the heated bathroom floor were special amenities for a winter visit. Looking forward to a return visit sometime soon!

Loved this cozy stay with friends and their small human - great kitchen for home-cooked meals, great toys (board and stuffed!) for the kiddo, serene atmospheres for busy adults to wind down and spend quality time together, thoughtful touches, tasteful cabin decor. All was as advertised so the following isn't a criticism but rather an FYI for those deciding to stay - the entrance to one of the bedrooms is either through the (1) bathroom or through the spare bedroom, so best suited for a group of close friends/family who are willing to share a space rather than a large group looking for privacy from each other. That said, we in particular would gladly come back!
Such a cute spot. Would definitely go back.
This was such a perfect cabin to be in! It was super cozy and had all the amenities we needed. It was in a great location as well! We will forsure book again
Beautiful cabin with enough seclusion to really feel like you’re in the middle of nowhere. The hot tub was a huge plus as well as the comfy big beds and fireplace. 5 star indeed

This was one of my favorite stays. The place was absolutely gorgeous and it's the perfect location for a peaceful weekend in nature. Between the wood stove, cozy lighting, hot tub, full kitchen, and heated bathroom floor, there was so much to love about it. We will absolutely be returning here.
Beautiful cabin, loved the space and lighting. VERY comfortable master bed. We loved the hot tub, and all the games offered.

An exceptionally beautiful home. The attention to detail was in each and every room. Tastefully decorated with extras. The beds were very comfortable, kitchen well stocked, quality towels/linens. I cooked 3 meals each day and never lacked what was needed for meal preparation. Several cozy locations to curl up and read a book. I was there with my son and grandson. They enjoyed the games and hot tub. The park is only open Friday, Saturday & Sunday during the winter. That was our only disappointment but I should have checked that in advance. Every aspect was easy and exceeded our expectations. The loft area is perfect for kids. You can see and hear them but feels very much their own special place.
What a magical lil cabin can’t wait to comeback

Omgg this was the CUTEST place to stay! It was so beautiful and so quiet. There are neighbors but neither of you can see each other and the entire neighborhood is quiet. The house itself was so adorable, and the bears everywhere made us laugh. It feels so incredibly homey, and like it's your own getaway house. I am definitely taking notes on what I want my future house to have! The Jacuzzi was perfect and being surrounded by a forest was so nice. I've been to a few airbnbs but this one is definitely my favorite hands down. PA is only a ten-ish drive away but you're still secluded enough to feel immense privacy. Absolutely stunning house and surroundings. We will definitely be back and definitely for a longer stay.

This was our second year taking our family here for a mid-winter escape and we’re already planning our trip next year! The cabin feels like the owners actually stay here, not that they’re just throwing a place together for a quick buck.
Favorite parts, by family member
7yo: board games!
2yo: cedar hot tub and no bedtime
Dad: cedar hot tub, wood stove, comfy bed and pillows (and he’s picky!). All the bears!
Mom: lots of open space to hang out, wood stove, heated bathroom floors (!!).

Beautiful, clean, and well appointed cabin on an awesome property in a fantastic location - what more could you want?! We were seriously impressed by both the interior of the cabin and the property itself, everything was actually BETTER in real life than in the pictures (which is rare!). The outdoor area is so picturesque and has a lovely hot tub, fire pit, sitting areas, and trails directly off the property. We also loved that the main bedroom actually has a large king size bed and was super cozy. You’re also minutes from an entrance to the Olympics, I seriously don’t think you could get much closer without camping. Overall, highly recommend!

Sara and Ashley are great hosts who are super responsive! We enjoyed our stay at this beautiful cabin, especially the hot tub. All the instructions and resources were shared well in advance, which made the entire checkin process easy. The place was kept clean, organized and well throughout with cozy cabin vibes. I highly recommend this place!
Had an amazing stay, only problem we had was toilet wouldn’t flush occasionally

We are enjoyed our stay here and wish we could stay longer. Our stay has been a very pleasant experience and we were surprised at all the amenities that we discovered. Our expectations have been exceeded and we plan to visit again in the near future.

Fantastic location that is also very private! Couldn't have asked for a better place to disconnect from the outside world! The inside decor is very welcoming and comfy! They supply everything you need, full kitchen, lots of beds, plenty of towels, lots of DVDs to watch movies, jacuzzi, firewood, grill, and even a Tesla charger. Would 100% recommend to anyone who is looking for a private peaceful stay in the woods with all the comfort of home.
We loved this adorable cabin retreat and would easily come back! Especially loved the hot tub even with the colder November weather.
One of the best air bnb’s we’ve stayed at! Very clean and exactly as listed. Definitely recommend this place to couples and families interested in a home base to explore Olympic National Park
Amazing host! Amazing property!

Traveled here from CT so we could explore the peninsula. The home was beautiful & cozy. Had a lot of great amenities: heated bathroom floors, wood stove, grill, hot tub.
The hosts were super friendly & communication was a 10/10. I would definitely stay here again! We didn’t want to leave!

We stayed 4 nights at this cabin and will certainly be back for an even longer stay! Perfectly appointed with every amenity you could ever think of, and a few you may not realize you need til you’re there. We were looking to turn off our phones and recharge our batteries following an intensely busy stretch of life… this was the perfect spot. Super comfortable beds, beautiful cedar hot tub, walking distance to many hiking trails, and modern conveniences throughout the cabin. WiFi and TV didn’t work well, but a blessing in disguise to be honest as we were able to concentrate on relaxing. Highly recc’d!

Privately tucked amongst cedar trees, this house is so thoughtfully designed (inside and out) that we are hoping to come back next summer. Our intention for the weekend was to rest and be together (it was a romantic getaway for us) and we could not have been more satisfied with EVERYTHING! I am a realtor on Whidbey Island. I see a lot of vacation rentals. The care and love that went into this place is palpable. We loved that we felt "so far away" yet were still close enough to Pt. Angeles that we had access to great dining. The house exceeded our expectations. If you are looking for a quiet retreat surrounded by beauty, this is it! Already looking forward to a summertime visit!
This cabin was incredibly comfortable and had every amenity imaginable. Would not hesitate to book again in the future.

Great location right at the entrance of Olympic National Park. Was great to get away from the hustle and bustle of things and take some time to relax in this beautiful forest. Would return and stay here if we were every in the area again!

Great place to relax & enjoy nature. The outdoor area was really nice. Enjoyed the hot tub.
House had a great cabin feel to it.
Would definitely come back.
We had a wonderful, relaxing visit and will sure to be back!

Cozy cabin. Felt like home. Clean renovated bathroom, soft new towels, heated bathroom floors. Well equipped kitchen. Loved wooden walls in bedrooms. Loft was a fun place for our younger daughter. Enjoyed wood burning fireplace. Comfy couches. Very well decorated cabin! Very cool wooden hot tub, fire pit with chairs and more! Literally 10 seconds away from Hurricane Ridge entrance! We had a great time with our family at this cabin! Thank you!

Fantastic stay at the Hurricane Ridge Retreat. The property feels really private even though is just a few minutes drive from Port Angeles, and just around the corner from the Hurricane Ridge Park entrance. We really enjoyed lying on the wooden loungers looking up at the trees and watching the birds, and relaxing in the hot tub after hiking. The house is really cosy (specially the bedrooms) which made it difficult to leave for hikes in the morning!.
Overall we had a great stay and wished we could have stayed longer.
Loved my stay. Beautiful location and very private. So nice to unwind from the hustle + bustle of my everyday in the city.
We had amazing stay. It was the perfect place for us after a long day of hiking. Looking forward to coming back someday!

This is a beautiful clean cabin. Very secluded and quiet. We felt alone in the woods and that’s just what we wanted. We’ve stayed at quite a few cabins over the last few years and this was one of the top ones. Everything worked, was laid out nicely, very clean, private, etc. I actually left something behind and the host was so kind as to offer to send it back to me. We plan to stay here again in the future for sure. We just loved it. So random but their DVD collection was 10/10 lol.
Very comfortable and peaceful mountain getaway, with unbeatable access to hurricane ridge. Very well kept, cozy, and relaxing.
A really charming cabin, highly recommended.

We absolutely loved staying at this cabin for our Olympic Peninsula explorations. We stayed in Forks for a few days prior to coming here to explore the west side, and then we came here. From here, we explored Hurricane Ridge, Lake Crescent, and Port Townsend for whale watching. This cabin was the perfect basecamp for our adventures, and we loved coming home each day to this peaceful and beautiful cabin and property. We loved the outdoor area for star gazing and soaking in the cedar hot tub. The house itself was so cozy, homey, and clean. We would love to come again!!

This charming cabin was a last minute booking as my family had some itinerary changes to our Washington trip. We couldn’t have lucked out more! As soon as we got to the house we regretted having to leave the next day! Everything was perfect and thought of. The mountain charm throughout the home was great. The rain shower felt AMAZING after a day of hiking. The bed in the main bedroom was literal heaven. Our kids loved the bed in the loft, the checkers and the cool Jenga blocks!

Host did a great job with the place. Sleeping arrangements are really good. There was a tesla car charger which helped. Great location to go to hurricane ridge and make a pitstop when doing the loop. We stayed for a day and felt it was a little expensive. Overall we enjoyed a lot

Absolutely loved our stay - it was incredibly close to the Hurricane Ridge entrance of Olympic National Park which made it the perfect location for us! The care into the details of this home was above and beyond and it showed! The hot tub was the cherry on top. Would definitely return!
Very relaxing stay for our family!
Amazing location, and very well done home/property. We were sad to leave!

Tucked inside the Olympic National Forest, this place is magical. It was so convenient to hiking Hurricane Ridge. The hot tub was wonderful for relaxing after a day of hiking. The place was exactly as described- very cozy and comfortable. I hope to stay again soon!

We loved our stay here. It was so peaceful and the perfect access point to our adventures in Olympic National Park. My husband and I loved the heated bathroom floor, stocked kitchen and king sized bed while our five year old loved the board games and the deer that came to visit us while we were in the hot tub. We’d definitely stay here again!

This house is everything advertised and MORE! It is comfortable and clean, well-furnished and well-provisioned, and provides an incredible, peaceful retreat from the outside world. The beds were SUPER comfortable, the bathroom was modern with heated floors and an amazing shower, kitchen was stocked with everything we needed (including every type of coffee accoutrement anyone would need) and there was plenty of information about the house, the surrounding areas, and activities. The best part of the house is the outdoor space! There is a lovely soaking tub, a fire pit (owners provided wood! they also left some makings for s'mores, but I'd recommend bringing your own) and hammocks in the trees for extra peaceful afternoons. This is a fantastic place to stay!
We had a great time staying at the cabin. It was peaceful and a perfect location. Everything worked as it should and the property manager was very responsive. We would love to stay here again.
Awesome!!! It was the perfect location and set up for my family to enjoy Olympic National Park. The kids loved the hot tub and making s'mores at the fire pit at night. We can't wait to come back!
Such a beautiful cabin with the cutest details. Definitely will be coming back to stay again in the future.

As every other review says, this place is AMAZING! Worth every cent if you’re looking to escape and enjoy nature. My husband and I traveled with our 7 month old and we loved that we could watch her monitor via wifi from the hot tub! What a wonderful first family get away.

We had a great stay at the Hurricane Ridge Retreat. It fit our family of 5 perfectly and was so cozy and welcoming. The hot tub was a favorite spot each evening after a day of hiking & exploring. We stayed 6 nights and having a washer & dryer was an added bonus. Great location and so peaceful! Really appreciated the attention to detail. The s’mores fixings and bottle of wine waiting for us were so nice! Highly recommend!!
Excellent place to stay!! We really enjoyed the cedar hot tub and the trail that is accessible from the property.

Booked this place before we knew that hurricane ridge was to be closed. However, this was still the best place we stayed on our entire Olympia trip. It is extremely well located with multiple hikes very close by. The outside area was amazing. 1st time in a cedar hot tub, which was great. Got to see deer wandering around regularly. Would definitely rent again if in the area.
Great place in a cool spot. Loved enjoying the bon fire pit in the evenings. We will definitely be back when Hurricane Ridge is back open. Thanks!
Beautiful and secluded.

Spent a long weekend here, serves as an excellent base camp for hikes around Hurricane Ridge and Lake Crescent. Interior is well designed and rustic and the outdoor seating and fire pit were excellent. Cedar tub was superb. Overall, a great spot for a quiet long weekend.
We stayed for a week for our honeymoon. We will be back! 5 stars

Ever find one of those places where it's so terrific that you're amazed it's not booked solid and unavailable all the time? This is one of those. Beautiful. Relaxing. Comfortable. Well thought-through basics tucked away right where they're needed. If their calendar gets a bit tighter, it's because we'll be some of the people filling it up with return visits.

I’m so glad we were able to find this cabin online! Absolutely stunning views, so peaceful. It was in the perfect location, close to the main attractions of the National Park, while also a fifteen minute drive to Port Angeles. The outdoor patio was beautiful, and amazing at night with the fire pit and cedar hot tub. The interior was great, the heated tile floor in the bathroom was clutch for the cooler nights. We’re already talking about coming back!

One of my favorite Airbnbs.
This pristine and cozy cabin exceeded our expectations. The cedar hot tub was our favorite and the surroundings are stunning. The beds are so comfortable and the bathroom is luxurious. It was the best getaway for a birthday weekend with friends.
10/10 recommend.

Absolutely stunning!! Exactly what we needed! The beautiful back yard of forest, and the perfect selection of board games to play inside! And the hot tub!☺️
Thank you again for helping to make this an amazing 2 day get away!
This cabin exceeded our expectations in every way! It is absolutely perfect for a peaceful retreat in the most beautiful surroundings! Great to disconnect from the world.
beautiful, cozy home! it was clean, welcoming, and just perfect
Great place to stay - peaceful location with easy access to Hurricane Ridge. Hot tub was unique and super nice.

Loved our stay. Very picturesque, quiet and comfy - perfect for moms book club weekend. we were having such a great time, we ask for late check out the day before we were supposed to check out. They were very responsive and allowed us to do that. We also forgot a couple of items, which they located, and sent to us! Very accommodating.

Location and accommodation exceeded our expectations. Amazing location, comfy beds, amazing shower. We loved it. Wish we could have stayed the week. Highly recommend even for the most discerning traveler.
This is a superb location, close enough to town, but beautifully private and serene. The cabin is fantastic and a great value. We loved our stay here.

Absolutely one of the nicest Air BnBs we’ve ever stayed in. So clean and well appointed—it felt like we were the first people to ever stay there! The quality of everything in the house is excellent. So many little touches that just made it feel so special and relaxing. We really felt cared for. So glad we stayed and hope to return again one day!

This was a cute cabin in beautiful surroundings! I love the attention to details in this unit. So close tow town that has everything you need. The only thing that would have been better is if the heat was turned on before our arrival. The unit was very cold in the winter. But overall, we loved this place!

One of the best air bnbs we've stayed at! the property is full of amenities and has a well stocked kitchen. our favorites were the heated bathroom floors and the cedar hot tub. we could not say enough nice things about this spot and will definitely be back soon!
great spot!
Amazing stay. Super clean and cozy. This place deserves a million stars!!!!
This location is beautiful and the cabin is a perfect getaway home. Amazing job with the decor and landscape!

Beautiful home in a private setting. Hot tub was very relaxing after a long day. The heated floors in the bathroom were an added plus! Beds were super comfortable. Loved the way the place was decorated! Easy check in/check out. Only con would be no service but personally that is a pro for me as I don’t like being bothered on vacation 😅 Added to our list of places to stay again.

We are constant repeats at this spot, and will continue to be for generations to come 😀. The cabin is maintained perfectly, the location is unbeatable, and the backyard is about as beautiful and natural as it gets! Great hosts!!

I’ve used Airbnb many times, and this may be my favorite stay. The cabin is located right outside the entrance of Hurricane Ridge which made access quick and easy; it’s also a short easy drive to Port Angeles, so getting all of the essentials was seamless.
There’s much more space in the cabin than I anticipated, the loft basically serves as a third bedroom, which our kids LOVED.
The property itself is obviously well cared for, from all of the details inside to the outside set up, it’s apparent that so much care is put into the cabin. Without a doubt, we’ll be staying here in the future.
Really enjoyed out stay at this lovely cabin. It was warm, cozy and perfect spot for our family to pop up to Hurricane Ridge to get some ski time.

This was my family’s favorite vacation spot! The entire cabin was incredibly cozy. The bed was very comfortable, the kitchen well stocked and had a delightful s’mores / warm drink set up. The hot tub was especially fun during the snow. We’re already excited to plan our return trip!
This cabin was amazing in every way. Worth every penny. You won’t regret choosing this Airbnb when you visit Olympic National Park. Nice and cozy and so much attention to detail. It was perfect!

We loved our stay here! So cozy. Had a quick one-nighter after a day of hiking in the park. This house is 3 minutes from the Lake Angeles trailhead and about 15 minutes from Port Angeles, making it the perfect spot for hikers. The hot tub and shower inside are both amazing after a long hike. The host generously let us in before check-in time so we could change into dry clothes before getting lunch. Much more space to sleep than we initially thought – plenty of space for three guys.

Amazing private, quite place, in the middle of fairytale forest with deer families passing by. If you are looking for the perfect relaxation getaway - I highly recommend it. The cedar barrel outside, with spectacular view on the forest is something that will certainly change your entire perspective of how hot tube should look/feel like. I do not think I will enjoy chilling in other type of hot tube from this very moment.
Should emphasize the all small touching details in the house - you can definitely say that the person who owns it truly love this place from the bottom of the heat.
I can’t imagine more calm place that will bring you to the Christmas mood even then it is still one month ahead.
Place was perfect, hot tub, king bed, kitchen, all of it was great. We’re already thinking about going back.

No complaints except for that the internet is relatively slow, and the hot tub instructions were sparse. The hot tub takes very long (several hours) to get to target temperature.
Great place and location otherwise.
This cabin was absolutely perfect. You can tell a lot of love goes into this place with all the decorations and amenities. Everything you may want or need is available and the host is so kind.

Absolutely loved staying the Hurricane Ridge Retreat. The moment we pulled up into the driveway, we fell in love with it. The cabin smelled amazing and the decor made it that much more cozier. We had everything we needed to make dinner our first night, we enjoyed the hot tub in the middle of the forest and under the stars, and we slept so well that it was difficult to get up for our drive to our hikes in the morning. 5/5 stars for everything and we can’t wait to bring our friends and family here in the future!

Great cabin - would work well for two couples or a family. Loved the cedar hot tub, fire pit, and proximity to the park.
Be sure to check the NPS website to see if Hurricane Ridge is open prior to your booking.

Amazing cozy cabin perfect for a home base for our hiking trip!
Place was just as we had expected and more! Nice little touches really makes you feel welcomed. Super clean and had everything we needed for our stay.
We will definitely book again!
Amazing place very clean and definitely recommend! I love it

This place was an absolutely perfect location to explore day hikes for the Olympic National Forest. The house had everything we needed and then some. If you're looking for an evening out for dinner head in town at Next Door Gastro Pub. Everything was as advertised! Fantastic trip...
We loved staying here. The cozy atmosphere and great views was key for a great weekend. The hot tub and amazing view made it a memorable adventure.

Great location if you want to explore Hurricane Ridge area. It is about a 2 minute drive to entrance. House is decorated very nicely and the outdoor space is a great place to relax after hiking…The hot tub was much appreciated. Lake Dawn is across the street so not actually viewable from backyard…but there is a hiking trail that may lead to a vista where you have a view?..we didn’t make it up that far. Wifi was a bit spotty so recommend making all important calls and communication prior to returning for the evening.
Loved everything about this place! No details were missed!
Easy check in, great location. Clean and well-stocked. Would do it again!
An amazing place with incredible attention to detail. The property, the amenities, and the facilities were all top notch. Anyone would be lucky to stay here.
Very clean and professionally maintained. Layout was a little confusing but it fit our family of 5 great.

This was the perfect place to explore the Hurricane Ridge section of Olympic National Park.
The house is extremely comfortable; the beds make you feel like you are sleeping on a cloud.
We all enjoyed the hot tub and lovely property! Would definitely come back!!

Wonderful, family friendly cabin! The owners have created such a beautiful and inviting place for kids and their parents to stay. Our son LOVED the loft space to play and watch a movie. He wanted desperately to take the large deer home with us and named him Rudy. The hot tub was a wonderful place for my husband and I to relax and unwind after hiking and exploring the beauty of Olympic National Park and the surrounding areas. The cabin is perfectly located near one of the visitor's centers and is not far from downtown Port Angeles. There are trails on the property itself as well as just down the road to explore. All in all, they have thought of everything you could need to make your stay perfect!

Great place to stay near hiking. Layout was a little funny, but not too inconvenient. There was no gas on property for the fire outside, although we didn’t try to message to get this sorted (was not a big deal for us).

Hurricane Ridge Retreat is a great place to stay while visiting Hurricane ridge or the Crescent Lake. Both are an easy car ride away. The cabin is fully renovated and has lots of great touches that make it feel homey. The beds were very comfortable. We would definitely recommend staying here to our family and friends.

This was the best cabin rental we have ever experienced. We sincerely appreciated the little details that made the stay extra special -- for instance, the first aid kit, the espresso machine, games, robes, s'more packs, the citronella candles..we could go on and on. Someone walked carefully through the every day life of a vacationer and anticipated his/her every need. The cabin was clean and comfortable and decorated perfectly. We long to return for a soak in the hot tub and to sit around the fire pit. Thank you for opening your cabin so that we could experience the magic of the forest in simple yet luxurious style.

We took this trip for my daughter’s 16th birthday so it was all focused on her. My 8yo son was very gracious about doing everything she wanted to do and only wanted this hot tub. We specifically booked this place cause he asked for a hot tub, and it was much more expensive than we would have liked. Needless to say the hot tub did not work. When I messaged them, thinking I didn’t know how to get it to work, Instead of sending instructions or saying “hmm that’s odd, try this or that and if not I’ll get someone out there,” they immediately responded saying it was too late to send someone. I responded saying “hey just tell me how to do it I dont know if somethings wrong…..” They were then completely unresponsive the rest of that evening and through the next morning, even to the Airbnb people who tried to contact them. Because of the amount of $ we spent that we wouldn’t have without wanting the hot tub, everything was very disappointing. Though the property/house was beautiful, I would steer clear because if you have any issues you may not get a response.

This was really a great cabin in the woods. We used it as of jumping off point to go up to Hurricane Ridge (completely amazing) and explore the Olympic National Park. We also loved exploring the trail right from the property. Didn’t see a soul!
We also took the Little river road right from Lake Dawn Road as a cut through down to Madison Falls - worked out perfectly (kind of looks sketchy on the map but in the summer it’s totally easy).
Kids loved hanging around on the hammocks & the loft was a total hit. We had a little deer come visit too. The house was so clean, cute and well stocked. Exactly what we were looking for! The property management team was super easy to work with and very responsive. A+!

Our stay in the cabin exceeded our expectations. The attention to detail inside and outside the cabin is incredible and it was super clean. We appreciated the nice fluffy towels and comfy beds to come back to after a day hiking in the national park. The location is perfect for those wanting to explore Hurricane Ridge and Lake Crescent. Would recommend to anyone in a heartbeat for an incredible stay in the Pacific Northwest.

This cabin is what dreams are made of… super comfortable beds, everything you need for a great time (even s’mores kits), beautiful hiking trail right out of the backyard and minutes from the national park entrance. We will come from Florida again to visit this cabin.

This cabin is absolutely wonderful. Maybe the best Airbnb I have ever stayed at. Everything is perfectly thought out, from the hot tub and fire pit to the kitchen, bathroom, laundry, etc. The bed was very comfortable and the location was perfect after a hike on Hurricane Ridge

This place is amazing!! The place itself is so cozy with extremely comfortable beds and the “cozy corner” was the perfect place for sitting and watching a movie at the end of the day! The outdoor space is so cute, we loved the cedar wood hot tub after a long day of hiking. The appliances are all new/updated and the house was very clean. As for location, it was a perfect jumping off point for exploring all the area has to offer!! Would absolutely stay here again
Amazing place! We loved every second!

Great cabin in a great location. We loved coming back after a long day of hiking and getting to soak in the hot tub. Our little guy really loved the loft area too and that became his playroom when it was raining too much outside. Overall a great stay!
What a wonderful place! Our family had a great time! The perfect place for adventures and the girls loved the hot tub and s'mores.
This place is better than pictured. It felt like arriving home. Everything has been thought of and the location could not be any more perfect! If you are looking to enjoy the PNW, this is the place!

We have been road tripping through Washington state for 2 weeks staying in different Airbnbs in different cities. This one was our favorite! So cozy & the beds were so comfortable! Hot tub, fire place, heated bathroom floors, & nespresso machine was our favorite part! We are big on coffee & that just made our trip even better to be able to make our coffee at home with a view! Lots of awesome hikes! We did Hurricane Hill which is right up the road, Mount Storm King, Marymere Falls, Sol Duc Falls, & Hole in the Wall at Rialto Beach. Highly recommend staying here! We hope to come back one day! :)

This is such a lovely spot! Perfect for hikers and adventure enthusiasts who want to be close to different parks nearby. The hot tub was a great way to relax sore muscles from a day of hiking. This is an ideal place for 4 people.

the best cabin experience ever! Had everything you would need. Games, firewood, robes, detergent, s’mores kits, coffee, you name it! The cedar tub was perfect, even got to see some deer in the backyard! Minutes from hurricane ridge. Would love to stay here again!

Great and cozy cabin. Had everything we needed. My kids loved the stuffy decorations in the loft, ple t of fun games to play, of course the hot tub, and the huge dvd collection. The big shower and heater floors were a nice touch too. Heaters in every room kept us cozy. Kitchen had all the cooking equipment we needed. Robes provided for back and forth to the hot tub. Nice access to local hikes. We would definitely stay here again!
Amazing cabin! Host was super accommodating. Went for a girls trip and would recommend to anyone.

Spectacular. Cannot say enough good things. If you’re traveling with a toddler, we set up the pack and play in the space between the second bedroom and the bathroom which while it doesn’t have a door provided enough space between the kids to work well and meant we didn’t have to sleep in the loft!
Absolutely magical and beautiful retreat!
The place was fantastic! Location was great and they had tons of amenities as well.

We loved our stay. We loved the feeling of being surrounded by the forest. The location was ideal. It didn't feel like too long of a drive up and down the road to get to town, but it was remote enough that we felt like we were in a cabin in the woods. We found Port Angeles itself to be lovely as well.
We loved that the host was so thoughtful about the items in the house. Little things like games, firestarter, matches, roasting sticks, cooking oil, salt, pepper, coffee, tea, and soap were there for us even though these are things we normally always try to remember to pack because you never know what will be available, but this host was thoughtful enough to have them available in case we forgot our own. We had everything we needed for cooking, everything we needed for a stress-free stay.
We would love to come back someday.

🏔🐻 to the future guests of wanderers choice,
you are in for an amazing treat once you arrive at the cabin! the drive up was so beautiful and we were greeted with snowfall and a cozy spot to enjoy for a few days. the cabin has a wood stove that is fully stocked with fire wood. a large kitchen to fix up your favorite homemade soup to enjoy around the large table with your friends and family. the cedar tub is a full on treat and the ambience at night is so peaceful and enjoyable with the hanging lights. we loved having the fire pit going while soaking in the cedar tub drinking wine. at the end of the day you will find yourself sleeping in the most comfortable bed ever. we loved utilizing the stocked board and card games with our family. the shower is very impressive accompanied by a heated floor.
added touches include s’mores kits, espresso coffee and an amazing time!
see you soon Hurricane ridge!

Our favorite stay, ever! This cabin is nestled in one of the most beautiful forests in the whole world, for starters. The location was great. We arrived in a spring snow storm that made it even more enchanting. There is even a hiking trail that leaves from the driveway. Everything about the cabin itself was so well-considered and hospitable. You can tell that it is well-cared for. Our family (2 grownups, 2 kids, and a newly walking toddler), was completely comfortable. Great amenities for indoor and outdoor cooking, lots of games and toys, etc. Nicely updated bathroom and laundry with every detail provided for. The owners were very easy to get in touch with and very welcoming. The best!

This was the cleanest place I have ever stayed. The attention to detail was phenomenal. They have really gone out of their way to make this cabin special. The hot tub was perfect and we managed to make a fire in the fire pit for s’mores (they provide the supplies!) even though it was pouring out. This cabin is beyond perfect! We will definitely be back.
Highly recommended. Beautiful cabin and location. Would definitely recommend it.
Best Airbnb experience hands down!!

This place is everything you could want in a quiet, relaxing mountain getaway. The cedar hot tub is phenomenal after a long day of hiking. bonus points, there's even a trail right off the driveway that goes deep into the woods. didn't see a soul on it the entire time we were there or when we walked it. You won't be disappointed with this BNB, provided you remember you've got satellite internet here in the middle of no where. Time to disconnect!
Booked this location for my employee’s birthday weekend as a thank you for his hard work. Sounds like it was the exactly what he was expecting based on the listing and they had a perfect weekend.
Our favorite cabin yet! So comfortable and in a beautiful location. A great home base for all the Pacific Northwest activities we had planned!
We hosted a men's support group retreat at the Hurricane Ridge Retreat cabin. It exceeded our expectations and Wanderers Choice had set the bar for the location amenities. Thank you!

Absolutely loved our stay here! The Hurricane Ridge Retreat is a beautifully maintained property with so many cozy features. The heated bathroom floor, the cedar tub, the king-sized bed in the master - all were amazing! The decorations were very tasteful and give that perfect woodsy feel, I especially liked the electric kerosene lamps in every room. The kitchen had everything we needed to make our meals and the nespresso machine provided a tasty treat every morning. It is clear that the hosts have put a lot of thought into taking care of their guests' every need. I also love that the Retreat is as close as it gets to Hurricane Ridge, definitely worth it to drive up the mountain for some amazing views and exploration. All in all I could not recommend this property more, and truly hope to return someday!

The Hurricane Ridge Retreat is an amazing cabin; it's clean, comfortable, and has everything you need to make your trip to the Olympics a memorable one. Our group thoroughly enjoyed the cedar tub and fire pit after a long day of hiking and exploring, and greatly appreciated the comfortable beds. Highly recommended! Thanks!

Me and my wife went to celebrate our second anniversary in Wanderers Choice place. it was a great location, the outdoor pool and fireplace was great, even the master bedroom was also fantastic including the bedding.
one thing I think they can add is the mirrors, we liked the outdoor vibe near the fireplace and hot tub, but it kind of felt scary as there was no fence towards the forest.
Great place, great location, would love to come again.

Loved the location, easy to find.
Never wanted to leave the Hot Tub!
This was a great place to spend a relaxing weekend!

This is an amazing place, out in nature but still close enough to the city to spend the day there if you want. The beds are comfy and have plenty of pillows, the bathroom floors are heated, nice rainfall/pebble shower, the hot tub is great and easy to use. Overall, a wonderful experience.

Multiple times during our stay we raved about how this is a 5 star air BnB! From the absolute coziness of the cabin with its several places to relax (hello, daybed! I need one at home now), to the well stocked kitchen that had everything we needed for meals, and then some. The hot tub was perfect after a long hike, and the bed very comfortable. You can tell the hosts take the time to think of everything their guests will need to make their stay enjoyable. It was also quiet while still being very accessible from main roads. 10/10 would stay here again!
The perfect cozy cabin to stay with the cutest decor 😍 super easy to get to, communication with the host is fast! Would stay here again for sure!
Great house, great location to the National Park. Definitely recommend!

Came for the skiing but stayed for the cabin. We loved how close the cabin was located to Hurricane Ridge, being first timers we were amazed with the views as we drove up to the ridge. We enjoyed the beauty of the trees and snow while being cozy and comfortable in the cabin. It was the perfect place to enjoy some good food and board games with friends. Sitting in the cedar tub was a true treat to top off our stay at this winter wonderland.
Clean, comfortable, and the owners are really helpful. My vehicle stuck in the snow and they came and helped me. Thank you.
Magical

If you are looking for a place to take a break from school and work, this is the place! We had everything we need in the lodge, and the lodge has enough space for 5 people to live in! Indeed the yard is really big, and we really enjoyed the views of the snow and trees! It's also close to the hurricane ridge ski resort if you are a ski lover! Such a fun place to stay and will definitely come back!
Absolutely lovely.
What a beautiful place! Had such an amazing time that we already booked our next stay!!!

What a gem!! It is the definition of home away from home. A rain shower, espresso Machine, Netflix and walking trails! Pictures don't do this place justice. And if you have kids, there's plenty of games and things to keep them entertained. Can't wait to come back!

The value of this stay cannot be explained enough! We felt perfectly warm and cozy amidst the forest- completely immersed in nature. This Airbnb has endless amenities and is so beautifully designed. Easy drive to town for food, even easier drive to hiking trails. Will definitely return if we are ever back in the PNW!

Beautiful space with lots of room and privacy. The backyard was beyond our expectations. Numerous beds but only one shared bathroom. Cedar tub was amazing! They even provided firewood, wine, and a welcome note! Would love to come back to this amazing rental! 5 stars

Stop your search, this is as perfect of a cabin in the mountains experience as you're going to get. The fire chimney, cedar hot tub, hammocks everything oozes coziness! We had great family bonding playing all kinds of board games, making dinner with the fully stocked kitchen. Port Angeles is only a 10 minutes drive down the mountain and the hurricane visitor center is 20 minutes up. Trust us, you will not regret one bit. Come to this heavenly retreat to de-stress, reconnect, and feel alive again.
Amazing location. Fully equipped with everything you want and need.

We loved our time at this home. It was very clean and had everything we needed. The location was perfect for us as we were visiting the Olympic National Park. We had fun fishing on Lake Sutherland which is inside the gated community where the home is located. Gavin was quick to respond to any question we had. We would definitely stay here again.
Beautiful views. Great place for family vacation. The loft & bath would be great for kids! The kitchen accommodations were above expectation.
We really enjoyed our stay. It was a cute little home and my son loved the loft bed! It was very clean and comfy.

My husband, daughter and I had a wonderful 2 night stay at Gavin’s Tiny Home.
Olympic Peninsula is spectacular and having the ability to stay at a wonderful place like Gavin’s made the trip extra special.
We would love to return and spend more time …and will certainly try to stay at Gavin’s place again.
Love it, great community and next time I'm in I will book another stay.
Great location to access all of Olympic National park at a great price. Space is very well utilized and can easily accommodate 4 peopled. Very clean and great communication.

The home was exactly what we needed! Very cozy, with beautiful views of the lake. Lots of charm in the decor, the kitchen was well stocked and easy to use, and the sleeping arrangements were comfortable. Recommend this place for a small group or family looking to explore the Olympic Peninsula!

We had a wonderful time at this AirBnB, and we will certainly be back. First, the AirBnB is in a perfect location--near a lake and beautiful wooded hillside and just a few minutes drive from amazing hikes in Olympic. Second, the place itself had everything we could possibly need. It's cozy, clean, and well-stocked. I'm especially grateful for the bin of board games. Finally, Gavin is an extremely kind and responsive host. I highly recommend this place!

Just book this enchanting Airbnb! From the moment you drive up you won't want to leave! Amber listed all the must do's around the property, which was very helpful, and everything was withinan hour or closer drive. She takes pride in her beautiful home, it was spotless, beautiful, and the hot tub was the perfect way to end every day after exploring! Not to mention the bed is so comfortable! I would stay here over and over again. Thank you for sharing your home.

I needed a dreamy, peaceful getaway and this was it! I was absolutely delighted as soon as I arrived. The lights on the deck, the rushing river, the moss covered trees..it was like stepping into a different world. Very cozy, very inspiring!

We had a great time at Sol Duc Serenity! It is not only beautiful, but in a great location for exploring Olympic National Park! We greatly enjoyed the hot tub and relaxing in front of the fireplace after a long day of hiking. The bed is super comfortable! On our last day, six eagles were hanging out around the river. It was so peaceful! Also, I didn’t realize it until days after we left, but I left a banana bread I made in the oven! I’m so sorry for the cleaner if he/she had to find/clean it or the next guest! We really enjoyed our stay! Thank you!
Absolutely beautiful

We spent 2 nights here and were blown away by the location right on the river. It was so beautiful it was hard to leave each day to go hiking! We loved the large windows and the well stocked kitchen (we bought groceries from Forks and cooked meals in the house), and the deck overlooking the river. We saw bald eagles fly by!
This place was a good location for us to explore the Hoh Rainforest and some western and northern beaches on the peninsula.
The only issue we had was that the warm water from both sinks only lasted a minute or so before becoming freezing cold (fortunately this didn’t happen in the shower).
Overall it was an amazing stay and I’m so happy availability opened up for my trip! You will not regret booking this place!

i went back to count and of the 16 airbnb’s my husband and i have stayed at, this is by far our favorite. perfect in every way. beautiful. great location. had everything we needed. i only
wish we could’ve stayed longer :)

All I can say is, book it! If you’re coming to the area to experience the Olympic National Forest/Park like us, then this is the perfect place. Centrally located to see everything we wanted to see. We stayed five nights, and spent one of the days just enjoying the place and spending a lot of time in the hot tub feeling completely immersed in the forest. Cannot wait to return. Believe the hype in the reviews, it was perfect for us.

Christine and I stayed in Sol Duc Serenity for our honeymoon and it did not disappoint. The house is right next to the Sol Duc River and has two large picture windows. The cool evenings are perfect for the hot tub which is private and also overlooks the river. The highlights of our stay were morning coffees, sitting by the fire in the living room and reading, having a dip in the hot tub, watching movies in the evening and listening to the rain. We hope that Sol Duc Serenity will be available for years to come so that we can return to celebrate our anniversaries.

This is one of the most beautiful places that I have ever stayed! We saw an eagle from the porch, the fireplace was perfectly cozy, and it was easy to get to hikes in Olympic National Park and beat the crowd. Pretty sure I will be coming back ASAP!

My Fiancé and I (he proposed on the porch of this place!) had the most amazing stay here! The instructions were very clear, check out instructions were easy, and Amber was incredibly kind and caring and helped immensely with his proposal. The Hot tub was very clean and amazing even though it was chilly out, and the sounds of the river were unmatched! Definitely book this place, you won’t regret it - it blew all of our expectations out of the water!

This place is even better than the photos! Beautiful inside and out, and has everything you need for a long or short stay. The hot tub is simply amazing after a long day of hiking. Incredibly cozy inside, with a view so gorgeous it almost makes it hard to go venture into Olympic Nat’l Park.
Third time visiting. It’s a great spot and lovely location
Beautiful Airbnb, private with breathtaking views. Saw bald eagles flying by every afternoon. Had an issue with the bottom which was handled promptly by Amber. Loved it
Amazing home so comfortable and relaxing. perfect location river and hot tub were amazing. Didn't use the kitchen but looked well stocked everything was super clean highly recommend.

Great Place! My boyfriend & I did a 9-day roadtrip for my birthday, & this was our first stop! Absolutely beautiful home.
Remember to download offline maps before your trip! It's a lifesaver :)
We both loved it! Spent a day exploring the Hoh Rainforest, & came back to relax in the hotub. We ate our meals on the patio, & spent our nights looking up at the stars.
Perfect romantic getaway. Would definitely stay again!
- Jess & Randy

As you can probably tell by the fact that this place books up very quickly - this is an amazing stay. We were here for two nights and it was so peaceful, comfortable, and beautiful that we wish we could have stayed forever. Sol Duc River was gorgeous and had the most calming ambiance.
We found the bed to be very comfortable, the kitchen was well stocked, and the cabin itself was pristine.
If you can find an opening, BOOK IT. Even if it's in a slower season. Wonderful stay.

The easiest 5-star review we have ever written!
My wife and I just got married & spent the first part of our Honeymoon here! Amber’s gem in the PNW could not have been a more perfect experience & exceeded any and all expectations we had during our stay.
The location was prime, and was right in the middle of all the major attractions we were hoping to see in the ONP. During our four day stay, we were able to visit Mount Storm King, Marymere Falls, Hoh Rainforest, Cape Flattery, Ruby Beach & much more! And the view from the place? With breathtaking scenery and peaceful sounds from the Sol Duc River, the photos do not do its justice. After a long day of hiking, the hot tub and fireplace were magical.
Amber’s attention to detail is hard to miss, from the beautiful coffee mugs to the selection of books available, to the series of twilight movies at hand. She’s incredible! If you are looking for the perfect PNW getaway experience, look no further! We will be back again ❤️

Our stay was an absolute delight! The location is perfect for a quiet getaway, surrounded by scenic views that are truly stunning. It was the ideal spot for relaxing after a day of hiking. I highly recommend for anyone seeking a tranquil escape!!
Amber’s place was exactly what we needed- beautiful, peaceful, and surrounded by nature. It was quaint but had everything we needed. We are so glad we stayed here and would love to come back!

This Airbnb was absolutely beautiful. Everything was clean and easy to find. There were dvds and board games provided and of course the hot tub was perfect. The bed was also extremely comfortable. I didn’t realize the neighbors were going to be so close but fortunately everyone was still quiet during our stay. Overall, this place was gorgeous and we were very bummed to only stay for one night. Amber was also very responsive when we messaged her with questions :)

Beautiful spot right on the river. You could while away your whole trip just looking at the view! Good base for exploring the national park as well, just be prepared for longer drives as the places to see are quite spread out. Would definitely recommend and would love to come back!
Lovely spot for rest and relaxation. Peaceful, amazing nature, cozy cabin. Perfection all around. Super clean, very comfy bed and sofa. Great hot tub.

Amber’s place is an absolute oasis! We loved every minute of our stay there. The most serene, beautiful location. The surroundings were incredible, and we thoroughly enjoyed our time on the deck, in hot tub, and by the fire pit-even with the PNW rain. Comfy bed, cozy space, spacious bathroom. We will most definitely be back!

We had an amazing stay at Amber's home. The location is super convenient for exploring the nearby Nation Park or other scenic areas / trails. The home itself is very cozy and the hot tub on the river is an incredible experience. We so enjoyed the tranquility of our stay and hope to come back again for another visit in the future.
A great weekend getaway with easy access to hiking and the coast. The hot tub overlooking the river was incredible.

Perfect spot to get away for a couple of nights. Very quiet and comfortable. Soaking in the hot tub while watching the river flow by was a real treat. We spent a day exploring some of the beaches that we hadn't been to before: La Push, Ruby Beach and Kalaloch. Forks and the beaches are not too far away and the drive is beautiful. Since we were here during the winter, we mostly just lounged about, played games and read. The cabin makes a great base camp for explorations in the national park and surrounding areas.

Amber’s place was amazing! We loved the hot tub by the river and sitting by the fireplace. The bed was very comfortable and the kitchen was fully stocked. Location was very easy to get to. We’d love to come back again!

It's the stunning setting that really makes this place special. Very quiet and serene. It's very private, however, if the neighbors are there just make sure you wear your bathing suit. The floor to ceiling windows allow for a spectacular river view.
The space is small but very well decorated with a full kitchen that has everything you'll need to make nice meals. And you will want to bring food because restaurants are about 25 minutes away. The closest easy hike is about 5 minutes down the road with otherwise hikes 10 minutes away. We loved our visit and hope to return again.
We loved staying here!! It was even better than we expected and had everything we could’ve needed!
We came here for our honeymoon and could not be happier with our time here! It was so beautiful and so peaceful. We definitely plan to come back in a couple years for an anniversary. :)

The quintessential Pacific NW cabin experience! Gorgeous setting among moss-draped trees along the banks of the Sol Duc River. The sound of the river rushing by was peaceful and relaxing. The cabin was well-stocked with everything you need, including cozy blankets, local guide books and board games. Loved the Northwest-themed decor throughout. Being able to enjoy the river right from the hot tub was wonderful. While the river drowns out the road traffic noise on the river side of the house, the noise is somewhat audible in the bedroom, though not a major issue unless you are a very light sleeper. Amber was extremely responsive and friendly, even allowing us an early check-in. We'll be back!
thanks
incredibly beautiful place. I wish I could stay longer
amazing
We had a great time at Amber’s cabin. It was the perfect weekend getaway. I loved the hot tub and the river views.

Little slice of paradise in the PNW! Where to start with this gem…my friend and I were just there during this deep freeze in Jan, and it was the coziest , warmest , most peaceful place we have stayed in awhile. The bed was extremely comfortable, pillow top soft , all the fixtures and amenities were new and modern. You can tell Amber takes care of the property and pride in hosting. The cake topper is the hot tub , right next to the lovely flowing river , moss covered trees surrounding you, a gorgeous sunset down river … and then once the sunsets you have the most glorious view of the night sky . It really is magical.
As for location , it is easy to access from the main road, no need to worry about needing to have 4wheel drive . It is a perfect location to explore the upper part of the peninsula, from hiking shi-shi beach trail, to cape flattery , or to the east to spend time in Port Angeles or exploring Lake Crescent , it gives you a great jumping off point for flexible exploring !

Probably my favorite Airbnb stay for the year! Cabin is modern, cozy, well decorated and stocked, beautiful surroundings with hot tub right on the Sul Doc, and a great launching pad for Olympic adventures. Unfortunately the power went out because of a big storm but Amber was super responsive and compensated me for the disruption. Plan to come back soon and often! This place is a gem
We had a lovely stay! The river and hot tub were wonderful.
Had a great New Years trip here! The cabin was cozy and location was perfect to stay in and relax as well as do some hiking.

Very relaxing and wonderful retreat, with a hottub right by the river. The cozy fireplace felt really nice during the Christmas week I stayed. Clear instructions, easy check-in, and a plenty of amenities and towels. One of my favorites near the Olympic National Forest

What a lovely little cabin an hour away from Port Angeles and 20 minutes from Forks. It just off the road but feels so peaceful and secluded because the sound of the river drowns out everything else. Lovely little place! Would highly recommend.
The cabin was lovely with a beautiful river view! Amber was also very communicative. Would definitely stay at the cabin again!
Beautiful cabin! Would definitely stay again
A magical stay even in the colder months. Hiked in nearby trails and sat in the hot tub listening to the river rush by. Couldn't have been better, warmed my heart.

Perfection! Serenity is the perfect name for this little gem. The cabin was cozy, clean, wonderfully decorated, and private. THE VIEW! Wow! We arrived after dark, so waking up to the stunning view of the river was a magical feeling. Amber has done an amazing job making the cabin a beautiful home away from home and the hustle & bustle of the city.
We will definitely be back!

We really enjoyed our stay at Ambers place, we loved everything about it. The view off the deck is outstanding and the windows from the living room and kitchen are so big you really get to enjoy the view even from inside. The fireplace was so cozy and really warmed the place. The hot tub was so relaxing, and we enjoyed being surrounded by trees and listening to the river. We also enjoyed the location because we felt away from it all, but didn’t mind taking a drive to the many things to do and see in the national park. We were able to see beaches, go hiking, and our favorite was exploring the Hoh rainforest. We would love to stay here again in the future!

This place was by far the best we have ever stayed at. The pictures do not do it justice! It was so peaceful, magical and cozy - everything I wanted for a getaway to relax and check out. My only regret is not booking it for the whole week! It was within an hour of the majority of things we wanted to do and see in Olympic National park and perfect location between forks (for all the twilight fans) and port Angeles. The hot tub and fire place were amazing and made us feel like we were finally on vacation. WiFi is iffy but Amber warned us of that and we wanted a break from day to day life anyways so it actually helped us not be all up in our phones, but for those who don’t have the same plan as us, just keep that in mind. We had one tiny hiccup with the washing machine and Amber was extremely responsive and helpful! It was clean, beautifully decorated and matched the description. This is now our favorite place to stay in the PNW and I can’t wait to be back.
Amber’s cabin on the Sol-Duc was perfect for a weekend getaway. We’d love to stay here again!

This place was like something out of a dream definitely a must stay if visiting Olympic national park you won’t regret it also amber was super nice and very helpful with check in and check out very sweet person:)

One of the best Airbnb’s we’ve stayed in! I don’t think you’ll find a better place location-wise in the park. If you want to visit the coast, the rainforest, the lake, or Port Angeles, this place is right in the middle of it all - which is important because it’s a huge park that requires a bit of driving to see everything.
The house is exactly as you see it in pictures. A quaint getaway with a wonderful fireplace that warms the main room to the coziest degree. The porch opens to the Sol Duc, a blue river in the midst of mossy green trees and the relaxing sound of moving water right outside your door. We took full advantage of the upgraded hot tub and cooked hot dogs over the fire.
There aren’t a ton of food options on the peninsula, but luckily Amber has the house stocked with everything needed to make a meal, including a variety of spices. We picked up provisions in Forks and cooked salmon and steak each night!
Amber even came out within 30 min to help with the fireplace.

This was the perfect place to get away. If peace and quiet and beauty are what your looking for this is it!! Back porch sticks out over the river bank and the white water river puts off peaceful music for relaxation! The hot tub on the bank is a perfect place to relax coupled with the fire pit in the front. Neighbors were around working chopping wood etc but no noise or hassle what so ever. It’s not a go out on the town place it’s a get away and relax place and that’s exactly why we were there !!! Kitchen was well equipped for cooking and the fire place was an added enjoyment. All in all a great place and easy host! Don’t leave without seeing the Hoh rain forest and taking a trip out to the beach!

If you’re on the fence - just book it….You won’t regret it. We will be back time after time to visit this cabin. We are forever grateful to Amber for providing a lifetime of memories for me and my family.

My husband and I had the time of our lives on our honey moon here. We arrived late at night and was pleasantly pleased to walk into the most coziest, charming place. Waking up to the view was unreal. We were blown away with the beauty of the location and home, From inside to out, this home is truly special and so beautiful. The amenities were all readily available and plenty of options for things to utilize if need be. The bed was literally the best bed we have both ever spelt in. Thank you so much Amber for a wonderful stay!! We will hopefully one day return!

We loved every second of our stay! It is secluded and private, with stunning views! Amber gave us plenty of recommendations and we tried every single one! It was super clean and exactly what we were looking for. It was perfectly located for all the things we wanted to see and visit while in Washington. If we ever take a trip to Washington again, this is where we will be staying because Amber is an amazing host!

Amber’s place is a beautiful and peaceful little getaway spot for the weekend!! The space had everything needed for a trip between two friends looking for a cozy weekend away from the city, with all the natural beauty of Sol Duc River and Olympic National Park surrounding it.
Amber was super helpful and proactive at sending instructions and giving us a description of the space and where to get groceries nearby, and everything was clean and well organized. Highly recommend! 😊

Easiest 5 star review I’ve ever written! This cute little house on the river is a dream. We spent two nights and it definitely wasn’t enough. The picturesque view looking out to the beautiful fall foliage and the river were everything we could have hoped for and more. Warning: you’ll never want to leave the deck once you park yourself there to listen to the running river with a cup of coffee or glass of wine. We were lucky enough to be there during the peak of fall foliage. Relaxing in the hot tub was very peaceful. The house was clean and cozy. Thanks Amber :)

This house was absolutely beautiful and in such a unique spot!!!! I couldn’t be happier with our stay here! It was so cool with the beautiful mossy trees and the river right there. Also it was a great location for where we went to the park and also isn’t far from the coast! We would definitely stay here again!!!

Amber's cabin is such a perfect place to get away from the hustle and bustle of the world. She gives excellent directions and its quite easy to find for feeling like you're miles away from everything. There is so much to do locally, hiking, beaches, tourist activities, or just enjoy the peace and quiet of the cabin with the river in the background. It is the perfect place unplug and unwind, either with your partner or some friends. The hot tub overlooking the river is the perfect place to let your body and mind take a break. Book your trip, you won't regret it!

A little slice of heaven is how I would describe Amber’s place. Nothing can describe the beauty that surrounds this little home. Waking up every morning and drinking my coffee on the porch with that beautiful view of the river was probably my favorite part of my trip. Amber was so helpful and an excellent communicator. My husband and I can’t wait to visit again, and we will definitely be staying here.

This was hands down my favorite airbnb I have ever stayed at. Breathtaking views right out the front door. Amber has everything you could need in this little cabin and provided us with plenty of recommendations that we checked out. We used the hot tub every evening after being out hiking all day. Very comfortable bed and the shower water gets so hot, which is a must for me! I would definitely recommend this place to to anyone and would love to stay again!

One of the most beautifully serene places I’ve ever been. Amber’s cabin is the cutest and perfect for my husband and I. It comes well equipped with most essentials and she was very helpful through the whole process.

So a spiritual place, fell in love from the first sec. The view from the deck is simply fantastic. Very convenient location, but at night you feel like you sleep on the road, it's very close to the highway. The neighbors are very close also, but we were lucky with not so many people around. The cabin is tiny but it's ok for two people.
This place was magical!!! 😍😍 my boyfriend and I loved it. Looks even better in person! So cute and comfy. Super relaxing! Definitely recommend this place!

Absolutely beautiful place. The amenities were great, and everything we could ever need was provided. Nothing could beat sitting on the porch drinking coffee in the morning and then warming up around the fireplace inside at night.
Amber's place was incredible! so beautiful and great location! we will definitely be back.
Wonderful place
The space is stunning, with mossy trees, bright stars, and a peaceful river.
We had an amazing time at Amber’s home. It was a perfect way to spend the weekend in Olympic Park and celebrate our engagement. Thank you!

This was my 40th birthday trip and it was absolutely perfect! The hot tub and views of the river we're incredible. The home is so cozy and perfectly decorated. The bed feels like you sleeping on a cloud. I just couldn't have picked a better spot to ring in this new year of life!

My husband and I were in need of a getaway. Amber's cabin was exactly what we were looking for! The location is central to a lot of landmarks that we were interested in exploring. We stayed 3 nights and we were able to visit Kalaloch Beach, Ruby Beach, Rialto Beach, Lake Crescent, Hall of Mosses, Forks and Cape Flattery. The longest drive was a little over an hour.
The cabin was exactly as described. Tucked away from the highway and overlooking the river. I was able to make my way down to the river for some amazing sunset pictures. We had no complaints! Bed was comfy, living room and kitchen have everything you need (no microwave, but we didn't need it).
Finally, let's talk about the hot tub! Sometimes we come across these magical settings that we want to experience for our self....this is it! The hot tub is as close to the river as it can get. We enjoyed every minute looking at the scenery and listening to the sounds of the river. We will be back!

My husband and I spent a few days at Amber's place and it was perfect! It was clean, so cute, close to the Olympic National Park and such a peaceful location. It's such an amazing place for a getaway.

Absolutely perfect stay. Such a peaceful environment. Things we enjoyed the most: the amazing hot tub overlooking the river, the super plush rugs on our feet, the bed and linens were incredibly comfortable, the outdoor chairs to read and drink coffee while overlooking the river were perfect. I would absolutely stay here again.
Beautiful location in a cozy cabin. Looks exactly like the pictures!

Ambers place was the perfect location for our trip to Olympic National Park. It was conveniently located to all of the hikes and attractions we were interested in! We loved walking down to the river and cooling off a bit after the hikes and then taking a dip in the hot tub at night or building a fire! We enjoyed drinking our coffee each morning on the deck with the view and sound of the river in the background. Amber was an excellent host and very responsive! If I find my way back to Olympic National park area I will 100% book again.
Absolutely amazing! What a treat, we made dinner and breakfast and ate outside enjoying the beautiful sounds of the river
Amazing place. It was a much needed retreat. 10/10 would book again, if we’re back in the area.
Truly unreal setting on a beautiful river— lived hanging out in the hot tub listening to the sound of the river.

We had an amazing time and loved that the cabin was literally right in the middle of everything that we wanted to do. Olympic National Park is huge and everything will still quite a drive away, but we were right in the middle between the coast's hiking trails, Cape Flattery and Hurricane Ridge. Had we stayed in Port Angeles or Forks everything would have been much more of a drive each direction. The cabin was secluded and private, everything was clean and we felt very safe. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quiet retreat.

Along the Sol Duc River, the cabin is orientated towards the river and forest. Though the access road is close by, the river’s current muffle most noise of the little traffic one might hear. New hot tub was clean and allowed muscles to warm up after days of hiking. Centered between Crescent Lake and Forks, it was convenient if one is found going north, or south.
Stunning location and home! Also loved all the thoughtful touches throughout the house. Hot tub was incredible at the end of the day.
It was an absolutely beautiful home with breathtaking views. The perfect getaway! Ambers home was clean and had so many helpful instructions and cute notes🩵

Amber's place was amazing. The river views are breathtaking and the house is cozy and clean. Host was great at communicating promptly. We will definitely be renting this house again, if you are looking for a place to relax and unwind, this is it!
Awesome little cozy space with a beautiful view. Amber was great at providing everything we needed for a great stay!

Perfect relaxing getaway! Right off the river which created an amazing ambiance. The place itself was modern and picturesque. Lots of great areas to explore around the place itself. Will definitely be back!

Excellent cabin, right off the river. The place itself was modern and picturesque. Communication with Amber was very easy. We traveled with our 10-months old baby boy and can recommend the place to families. Lots of great areas to explore around the place itself.

Wow! I impulsively booked this place after seeing a tiktok and I am so thrilled that I did! The cabin is in perfect proximity to the river for a gorgeous view and relaxing white noise. Our stay was truly therapeutic! The location was perfect for us to easily drive to Hoh Rainforest, Forks, La Push, Lake Crescent, Sol Duc Falls and the most beautiful of my life at Cape Flattery. We were able to make simple meals for ourselves in the kitchen between hikes and drives which was a real time saver for us. The hot tub was a wonderful way to relax tired muscles at the end of the day. We would love to return again someday in the future! I’ll be thinking about this trip for a long long time!

Amber’s cabin was absolutely amazing. It is conveniently located and just a short distance from Forks where we bought our groceries for the week and they have a couple of restaurants. The cabin and the view are absolutely beautiful and we really enjoyed the hot tub at the end of each day, which was full of hiking so it was perfect. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom is very spacious. Amber is highly responsive and sent clear pre- check in and pre-check out instructions. We highly recommend this cabin and if we ever come back to the area we would 100% book here again. Thank you Amber, for helping make our honeymoon relaxing and stress free!
Lovely place that I’d happily revisit!
Such a beautiful and peaceful location. Definitely romantic for couples. We can’t to rebook!
It was one of the best places I’ve stayed! I’ll definitely be staying here if I go back to Washington!

You kind of have an idea of the feeling Amber’s place has based off the pictures but it is so much better in person. I didn’t think it was possible. The home, the views, everything about it. Amber was very friendly and super informative on everything. Her home has little notes to remind you how to work certain things which I think is super helpful. I unfortunately had to cut my trip short but would stay there 10x over. Port Angeles isn’t too far (45 mins) and the drive is beautiful everywhere you go. This place is a little slice of heaven. I hope to stay here again in the future!
A truly magical stay - I could not even put into words what a great getaway this trip was. Sadly didn’t get to try out the hot tub but I’m definitely planning on coming back soon!

Honestly one of the best spots we’ve stayed in around the area if solitude and scenery are what you are looking for. Nothing quite like waking up and strolling into the living room to the big windows and the river right outside.
The place was very comfortable and really felt like home for the time we were there, so much so that it was quite sad to have to leave and go back to our actual home.
Couldn’t have asked for a better place to celebrate an anniversary and to escape the fast paced world for a few days. Definitely will want to try and make this a tradition for us moving forward.

I can’t begin to describe how wonderful our stay was. Amber was an amazing host. Always friendly and responsive. The location feels like the set of a movie. Everything was perfect. All of the little touches like the lights on the porch, the hot tub, the fire pit, just made it extra special. We would definitely stay again!

10/10!! Would be delighted to stay again!!
Amber has created a gorgeous modern retreat on the river and has provided perfect amenities, from a riverside hot tub and gorgeous open deck, to an updated Kitchen, cozy living room (all with incredible views of the river), a fabulous and updated large and clean bathroom, and a charming bedroom with a super comfy bed.
I'm so happy I treated myself to time at this unforgettable place! The rushing river and lush surroundings captivated my attention and fed my love for nature. Truly incredible!
After reading other reviews with guests lamenting having to leave the airbnb for other activities they'd planned, I knew I needed no further excursions- this amazing location is one of a kind and you won't want to leave!
This place was absolutely beautiful I proposed to my girlfriend here and it was absolutely perfect experience amber was the perfect host
Absolutely enjoyed this stay! What a beautiful and well kept property. Stunning views.

My fiancé and I loved our stay! The place is very easy to navigate to and simply stunning! You will love waking up in the morning to the beautiful river views. The common area is spacious, kitchen has everything you need to cook and bake, and is even equipped with laundry machines if needed. The heating kept us cozy and hot tub was the perfect way to end the day. I even saw a bald eagle fly over! Amber was very responsive and helpful as well. It was truly a magical stay and we would love to go back. Highly recommend!

This was a great location for a few days of adventuring around Olympic National Park. It was cute, but small if you are looking for a place for more than a couple people. Hot tub and fire place are 10/10.
We loved our stay here. Incredibly private and peaceful. Exactly what I would look for in a vacation rental. Hope to return soon!

Absolutely beautiful and tranquil experience. Although exploring the Olympic Peninsula was in our plans, we could have just as easily spent all our time at the AirBNB relaxing. Would definitely stay again.

I planned a surprise anniversary getaway to Olympic National Park for my husband and I, which far exceeded my expectations. The place is a slice of paradise!
