Truly one of the best host and I highly recommend staying here. I was on the fence when I first stumbled upon this place as I thought it was too good to be true, but I read someone else’s review who said book it you won’t regret it. Well I echo those thoughts. Book this place if you want to spend your weekend in paradise.
P.S. The hot tub and firepit are a plus!
Beautiful little place, impeccably kept by Amber. Felt so cozy. Sitting in the hot tub and enjoying the river was an amazing experience. Really comfortable quilt on the bed.
This was one of the most beautiful Airbnbs I’ve stayed at, both for the surrounding nature and the clean and cute interior! We loved it.

Absolutely obsessed with Amber’s place. We literally did not want to leave- it’s even better than the photos. We spent our two days bouncing between the hot tub, the deck, and snuggling in front of the fireplace, and even decided to cut some of our travels short so we could spend more time at the airbnb. It’s not only gorgeous, but felt so welcoming and comforting. We will ABSOLUTELY be back, and I’m already recommending a stay to all of my friends.
Absolutely beautiful place! We didn’t want to leave.
Such a treat staying at this beautiful cabin. The view of the river was amazing and so peaceful. Would love to stay here again!

Great ambiance! very beautiful & amidst nature. river flowing & the sound of the wind over the water is very soothing & refreshing!!
we had planned quite a few places to visit in & around the area. with the great ambiance, my daughters were just excited to stay indoors & just enjoy the nature that was perfectly blended with this place.

We got this cabin as a little weekend get away and it was PERFECT! The surroundings were so relaxing and it was everything we were looking for. The host left great instructions and was communicative if we had any needs. Definitely recommend this cabin and the serenity it brought!

Honestly, words can not describe Amber’s place. It’s stunning, surreal, magical, just unbelievable. I loved everything second. We had light rain then full snow. It was the most beautiful experience ever. Even cleaning dishes I located a Bald Eagle! I’m will be back!!!

This little gem was just what we needed to have some relax and recharge time.
Everything was just as described and the place was so comfy and inviting. The mattress in the bedroom was like sleeping in a cloud. The sound of the river was so soothing and the hot tub was clean and just the perfect place to “zen” out.
The location is perfect and not to far to travel for some day adventures.
One of the best cabins I’ve stayed in booking from air bnb, will definitely be back!
Loved being right on the river.
What a beautiful place to stay! We had such a great time. Sitting in a hot tub by a rushing river … the absolute dream! And it was so private. Comfortable furnishings. Lovely getaway.

What a gem! Very unique and we felt as if we were part of the forest! The large picture windows were an amazing bonus! The view truly could not be beat! If you are looking for something that communes you with nature and helps to soothe your soul, THIS is the place to do it.

What an amazing place! The view is breathtaking and the space is so comfortable! It is only a 20-30 min drive to everything you need. This was our first time in the area and we are so happy we booked this Airbnb!
Amazing cabin, beautiful surroundings! Very private and peaceful.
Thanks so much for sharing your Sol Duc River getaway with us!

We loved staying here! Amber has done wonderful work making this cosy and romantic. Perfect for a couple’s getaway. We appreciated the very functional and usable kitchen and loved the cosy bed and the hot tub. We enjoyed this as our base during our fly fishing trip, it was a wonderful place to come home to after the long cold days on the river. Thanks Amber!

Amber’s place was absolutely breathtaking. We will definitely be returning to this peaceful little spot. It’s modern even though it’s secluded and has the cutest furniture! We absolutely loved staying here.

Amber’s rental cabin was extraordinarily beautiful. It was so peaceful and a slice of heaven to stay at! Beautiful location, everything just as described. We loved our stay overlooking the river. Clean and comfortable with all amenities clearly listed. Communication was clear and helpful.

This cabin is a dream! Beautifully furnished, great amenities, perfect location. The gorgeous large windows let you relax with the view and sounds of the Sol Duc. Even on a rainy day in February, it was worth the trip to relax in the hot tub and just nest inside. Amber made everything easy and responded to questions quickly. Would absolutely stay here again.

Our stay was truly an amazing experience. Everything was so well thought out and cozy. The bed was especially comfortable - loved your comforter. Amazing views and the Hot is amazing. this place was absolutely beautiful! It truly felt like home and was just so perfect. We booked this little cabin for my birthday and it was the perfect cozy oasis for two nights. We loved being right on the river and having access to the hot tub and warming up inside by the fire!

Great place to stay, beautiful view of the river and great proximity to the Forks/La Push area.
Beautiful place, beautiful location. Exactly what we hoped. We had a great time. Thanks, Amber!

I took my daughter and I up to this beautiful Airbnb and was not disappointed! Not only was the drive there gorgeous but the house and nature around it was everything we wanted. The cabin was utterly amazing. Amber was a fantastic host, clearly communicating the check in and out process. Her space is exactly as described and made for an amazing weekend away. Thank you so much for sharing, Amber!

Words really can’t describe how amazing it was to be that close to the river. Late night hot tubbing is highly recommended, the sound of the river, is just perfect to keep you relaxed. This place has an incredible location overlooking the River and trees surrounding that you feel like you’re deep inside the forest even though you’re not far from the cabins next door. Everything else was great about the stay and Amber was a great host!
Well worth it and beautiful. Definitely will return.
unique place to stay

Anyway, we highly recommend Amber’s place!

This little cabin made for a cozy couple of days during a snow storm. Everything about it was as described in the listing, and it was a lovely stay.

Wow! This cabin is absolutely stunning. The large windows face out to the river with stunning views. I could hear the river as I slept. Amazing place, everything about this cabin on the Sol Duc river lived up to the reviews and the description. I will be coming back!

This is a beautiful place. It is located right on the river. You get to hear the sounds of the river flowing while enjoying the hot tub located right next to it. It has beautiful windows that face the river and the woods behind it. It is very beautiful. I recommend for anyone looking to get away and loves the outdoors.

Absolutely loved our time here! Was the cutest house in the most beautiful setting — the River back drop was beautiful to see and listen to. Hot tub was perfect for the 2 of us. Had a slight challenge with getting the fireplace on but the heating was fine and Amber was incredibly responsive and helpful. Would absolutely stay again.
Great little cabin. Very well appointed and can’t beat the location.
We really enjoyed our stay. The location was amazing right on the river. The place was very clean. We can’t wait to come back.
Beautiful place! Relaxing, modern, and spectacular view. Just what we needed to get away and unwind.
Hands down my favorite Airbnb I have ever stayed in. Owner was very helpful and was able to put us on some of the best hiking trips around. 10/10 recommend.

I highly recommend this cabin to anyone looking for relaxation and peace and quiet. The sounds of the River are so soothing in the mornings while drinking coffee. The cabin itself is very cozy my wife and I didn’t want to leave.
This place is great! Amber went above and beyond to make sure this cabin was the perfect spot for a relaxing get away!

We had the best time at Amber's place. It was clean, nicely designed, perfectly situated along the Sol Duc river, and overall an oasis on the Olympic Peninsula. Thank you for having us and being a fantastic host Amber!
Amazing location. I can’t wait to come back here. So peaceful and serene.

If you’re questioning whether to book here or not…do it!!! My husband and I enjoyed every second here. The days got just a little warm without A/C but the evenings cooled it off quickly. A perfect location and setting for a few days in Olympic. Amber gave very detailed communication and made the stay incredibly easy and enjoyable. Highly recommend.

Absolutely loved staying here, I wish we had more than two days. The location was perfect for exploring ONP and coming back to a cozy little cabin on the river for a relaxing evening. Would highly recommend staying here for a magical wilderness experience.

We absolutely loved our stay. So peaceful, quiet, and had everything we needed. Very tastefully decorated and we felt every little detail was very thought through! Also great restaurant recommendations.
Great location!

We saw one neighbors once, but didn’t hear anyone or any noise. Just the type of rest we were looking for!
Had a really nice stay during the summer. The location is really ideal if you want to visit multiple locations throughout Olympic park which is what we did.

Cabin is beautiful and a relaxing place to stay, well suited for unwinding after exploring the PNW and Olympic peninsula! Cabin is clean, well maintained, and host provided clear instructions and communications to make this a really enjoyable stay!!!
Wonderful
Amazing place, beautiful location, and great host! Highly recommend!

Peaceful stay right on the river! Appreciated the stocked kitchen.
Cute house with immaculate views! Location was great, allowed us to explore Olympic with a central home base.

The host also provided several DVDs that we watched.

We absolutely loved this place. You are RIGHT ON THE RIVER- this is such an incredible luxury of sound, beauty, and sensory (we went in it for cold plunges). The location is great for so many good hikes like the Sol Duc Falls area and Storm King. The bed was very comfortable, the instructions and communication about everything were great. The deck and river were AMAZING. I would love love love to come back.

What can you say about staying on a river when visiting Olympic National Park? Well, its just idyllic. Being lulled to sleep and awakened by the sound of the river was incredibly relaxing. Watching the stars through the trees from the hot tub late at night was especially memorable as well. Thanks Amber! We hope to return in the future:-)

What a beautiful view! Between the moss-covered trees, river and gorgeous deck, we did not want to leave. Perfect location to explore the park and the place was so comfortable and clean! Amber was wonderful and communicative before our visit. Highly recommend!

This Airbnb was incredible! The view of the river and whole atmosphere were unbelievable and Amber thought of everything that someone could want while staying. Truly such a relaxing place to retreat to at the end of a full day exploring the Olympic Ntnl Forest.
The place is as described. Large deck overlooking rain forest and Sol duc river is unbeatable. Place is well kept and the host is very accommodating. You will love the place.
Amber was such a great host. The cabin was private, right in the river and had just the right amount of rustic/creature comforts. We would highly recommend this for a couples romantic getaway!
Lovely little gem! We enjoyed our stay at the peaceful getaway and can’t wait to come back.

When an unpredictable, natural event required us to vacate the cabin, Amber was responsive and helpful. She is, indeed, a Super Host. A very lovely spot.

This is a great place with beautiful deck overlooking the river. The house is well furnished and had all the basic amenities we needed. The host is easy to communicate with as well. Overall we really enjoyed our stay here.
Such a beautiful home and a perfect getaway! Truly a gem we would love to return to

Perfect location to access everything Olympic NP has to offer! Cutest set-up ever! We were greeted by string lights and a beautiful river! SO inviting! Lovely signage and instructions throughout the property so you know how to use everything.

Amazing rental, perfect location for visiting the National Forest, beach etc. The river is the perfect tranquil sound for relaxing.

Great place for a relaxing weekend getaway!
Very pleasant and immaculately set up. The host was very communicative and helpful. We wished we could have stayed longer.
Fantastic place, will plan to stay again

Cute cabin with a stunning view, perfect for a romantic getaway! It had everything we needed, and was a central location for hiking at Olympic National Park. Would return :)

Amber has created such a cozy space and we loved having it as our home base during our elopement weekend! Would certainly stay here again and am recommending to anyone looking for a back to the basics, cozy space for you and your partner!

There IS a wireless network if you ask--otherwise you have to walk a bit down the road to communicate, which would be inconvenient if you need the owner's attention for an immediate problem. As in the property description, it's a drive to any shopping or restaurants, so prepare to be self-sufficient with food. But the location is fairly central to some of ONP's major destinations. Perfect couples' getaway!

10/10 will come back!! My husband and I traveled to Washington for a week and stayed here for two out of the six nights. One of our favorite parts was spotting three different eagles hanging around over the river and watching them for hours while we were in the hot tub before they flew off around dusk.
Amber was also really helpful with any questions we had and did a wonderful job of giving directions to everything you need to know about the house in a thoughtful binder you will find when you arrive.
We hope to come stay here again in the future!

We rented as a “lets detach from the world” kind of trip and let me tell you, we were not disappointed!!! Such a beautiful area, the view of the river off the back porch was amazing and the house was so cozy. Location was great too, not too far of a drive from where we wanted to sightsee but also super quiet.
Definitely would recommend for anyone needing to reconnect with the world around them.

Amber’s place is magical. It is the first Airbnb I’ve stayed in that was even better than pictured. Very comfy and warm bed, great shower, cozy living area and a fully stocked kitchen so we could cook meals. We were truly blown away. Watching the bald eagles catch fish from the hot tub was the highlight of our trip. The central location made exploring ONP so easy. And because the house is *right* on the river, you don’t even realize you are just off the main road. Like others have mentioned, we did not have cell service, but it wasn’t really an issue, we just looked up anything we needed when we had service down the road. We cannot wait to come stay here again!

We had a great time, Amber was super helpful and friendly, and the house was perfect for our visit. We loved hearing the river and the hot tub was fantastic for relaxing after hiking. The location was perfect for our visits to the coast and Olympic National Park and we highly recommend Amber's house.
What a beautiful house in a perfect location right on the river. Very clean and great communication. I will be staying again next time I’m out here. Thanks for a great stay!

WOW!!! This location couldn’t be any more perfect! The backyard is absolutely stunning with gorgeous views of the river, and the home is situated in the perfect location to explore all things Olympic NP! Amber’s home is extremely clean and the kitchen is well stocked with every thing you need to cook meals while staying at the cabin. I would give this a home an 11/10 if I could, and my family can’t wait to return in the future!
We loved staying here on our trip to Olympic National Park. Everything was so comfortable and cozy, and there’s nothing like enjoying the hot tub by the river. Would absolutely stay here again!
beautiful home views were amazing.
The views and proximity to the river were even better than advertised. The hot tub was amazing, and overall a perfect sized place for two people. Very cozy and comfortable.

You will not want to leave!!! THIS is a true PNW rainforest getaway gem.
So private and cozy with an INCREDIBLE view. No problems finding! It’s 100% an escape with limited service and no WiFi. We LOVED it!!!

Amber is super responsive and on top of it as well! This is the best Airbnb we’ve stayed at yet.
This place is an absolute dream! The home is gorgeous and Amber is incredibly accommodating. It was my favorite spot we stayed on our whole trip!
An incredible little hideaway to come back to after a day of adventuring!
This AirBnB is as lovely as the pictures suggest, a deck over the river and georgous views from the big windows. The hot tub was great, too!

It was so peaceful staying here! Hot tub overlooking the river was amazing. Check in was easy.

This was a beautiful home. Shellay and Michael thought of everything from all the amenities available to us, as well as making sure it’s a cozy, comfortable home. Shellay was extremely responsive and welcoming. I would stay here again and again. As a frequent traveler and Airbnb user, their place is now my top spot.

As previous tenants already described: a great cottage, very fully and tastefully equipped. The only downside is the neighbor's dog. This barks all day when the owners are away.
Highly recommended, this cabin!
Shellay and Michael have put so much thought and effort into building a perfect cabin in the PNW. Look forward to staying again one day!
This was one of our favorite Airbnbs. Super cozy and peaceful. Would highly recommend. Thanks!

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Shellay & Michael's charming cabin in Port Angeles, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience. From the moment we arrived, we were enchanted by the warm and inviting atmosphere. The cabin served as an ideal retreat after our exhilarating hikes in the Olympic National Park. Its cozy interior provided the perfect setting to unwind and recharge.
We appreciated the cleanliness of the cabin, which added to the overall comfort of our stay. The thoughtful and tasteful decorations throughout the cabin added to its charm. We felt right at home and appreciated the personal touch that the host put into creating such an inviting space.
One of the standout aspects of the cabin was its convenient location. It was just the right distance from downtown Port Angeles, allowing us to easily explore the town's attractions and sample its local cuisine. I cannot recommend Shellay & Michael's cabin highly enough.
Absolutely a perfect charming place to stay if you're exploring the PNW. Highly recommend!

Shelley and Michael’s place was absolutely perfect. We loved the fire pit by the amazing trees. The studio was beautiful and so comfortable. The shower alone would bring me back! This was one of my favorite stays of all time.

We had the pleasure of staying at Shellay and Michael’s charming cottage for two nights in mid-June. As other guests have noted, the spotless cottage is equipped with virtually anything you’d want for a vacay stay, from barbecue tools to bathrobes. The bed is super comfy and the location in a grove of towering cedars is very peaceful. Shellay even dropped by at our invitation to share great local hiking and dining suggestions. If you do decide to go into town to buy groceries or grab a bite, it’s a 15-minute drive.
Shelley & Michael’s place was a gem. It was so cozy and the perfect cabin getaway. The place is very well stocked and organized. They truly thought of everything!
Fantastic place to stay! It might not work for 4 adults, but two adults and two kids are a perfect fit for this beautifully decorated and well equipped lodging.

With all due respect to other Airbnb properties we have stayed, Majestic Cedars set the bar! Private, spotless, cozy, beautifully furnished and well appointed. The details were extraordinarily (there were amenities to the amenities)! Had an opportunity to meet Shellay who is the perfect host!

Majestic Cedars cabin was beautiful inside and out. The decor was lovely - nice artwork, spacious bathroom. The amenities were the best of any place we have stayed. Every drawer and cabinet was stocked with all the necessities as well as some nice surprises like a Smores box and a beach box. Shellay thought of everything! We had an enjoyable and peaceful stay. We would highly recommend this place.

Wow! My husband and I stayed here during our anniversary trip and thought this was probably our favorite Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in. From the minute we walked in it felt so cozy! You can tell the owners put a lot of energy into making the space comfortable and their attention to detail is phenomenal. We would most definitely stay here again!
Beautiful, peaceful, and cozy. So many thoughtful touches that made it feel like a very special place!

Perfect spot to everywhere in Olympics National Park!
Cozy place with whatever we needed

Shellay and Michael’s place is amazing. The place the actually better than the photos. Bed is so comfortable that I don’t want to wake up in the morning. Bathroom is so clean and included everything that I needed. Bathrobe and towels are good quality. This is the best Airbnb experience that I ever had. I highly recommended this place and would definitely go back.
I highly recommend booking with Shellay & Michael!
Beautiful cabin with comfortable bed and all the amenities you can dream of!

Can’t recommend this beautiful little cabin enough! The location is perfect to do a number of hikes and sight seeing in the area. The neighbourhood felt very safe and peaceful. The Airbnb was perfect. So many thoughtful touches.
We loved freshwater bay, just a short drive away. We spent our mornings there watching the otters, and even saw seals!

This little cottage in the trees is first rate in every way! Spotless, beautifully decorated, and filled with extra touches. We’ve stayed at many Air B n B and this one is right at the top. Loved it in every way and highly recommend!

Shellay and Michael’s cabin exceeded my expectations of a cozy place to stay after a long day of hiking and exploring Olympic National Park. The attention to detail when it comes to amenities was phenomenal. I would love to stay here again on my next visit and would recommend it to everyone visiting the area.

When we saw the bright orange door, the covered porch and lovely table and chairs perfect place for early morning coffee or night cap. The interior was perfect! The interior was immaculate, just as pictured. The appliances were again new and modern. Everything we needed for meals was within reach. The furniture was new, comfy the bed and linens were luxurious. The bathroom was off the charts and saving the ideas for our next bath makeover. Again, sleek modern surfaces, robes, thick, fluffy towels. My favorite was the skylight overhead. I felt like I was showering among the cedars. The original artwork was beautiful and added that special touch to the cabin. One of the special treats was being able to watch deer feed out among the cedars from the back window or quietly from the porch! Again a wonderful relaxing retreat after a long flight.

Shellay and Michael have a beautiful cabin just west of Port Angeles that is very peaceful and quiet and close to nature.  Their cabin was very clean and comfortable, and they have thought of everything and more you will need to stay here. They were very responsive and communicated quickly when we had any questions.
Fantastic location. Idyllic, clean and very tastefully decorated. Fabulous
Had a great time at this clean and comfortable cabin. Beautiful surrounding area! Had everything you could think of and very cute touches throughout.

Such a wonderful place. A little ways to sightseeing and stores, but this just made it more peaceful. Totally worth it. We felt right at home and really enjoyed all the thought they put into stocking this place with everything you could need.

This was a perfect location for a few days exploring the Olympic Peninsula. The cabin was incredibly comfortable and had everything we could need. Port Angeles is about a 10-15 minute drive away and has plenty of shops and restaurants. We visited several of the more popular sites along the coast, which are between an hour to two hours away, but a very easy drive. Would highly recommend this cabin if you’re planning to explore the National Park and coast.
Beautiful place with great attention to details to everything. Loved our stay and would love to come back.

Beautiful cozy cabin among the cedars. We stayed here for our wedding in the Hoh Rainforest and the beautiful trees were a great backdrop for our first look photos. The bed was very comfortable as well.

By the far the most comfortable, cozy Airbnb I’ve ever stayed in. I’d love to come back here. It was beautiful, and peaceful, and I can’t say enough about how soft all the linens were! If you’re thinking about it, definitely do it!
Stunning place to stay with amazing vibes! It was so comfy and super clean! Felt like home!
Shellay and Michael’s place is spotlessly clean and super cozy. We enjoyed our stay so much. Shellay is especially helpful and welcoming. We will def come back whenever we are in Olympic!

Shellay and Michael’s place was the perfect place stay after a day exploring the Olympic National Park. The cabin was cute, clean, and well appointed. No detail was over looked. It’s a short drive to downtown Port Angeles and a very short drive to freshwater bay park which was a lovely beach. Our only regret was that we didn’t stay a second night. We wouId absolutely come back.

Shellay and Michaels place was such a dream! The cabin was everything we wanted and more!! They had all the amenities from extra towels to bedtime pillow spray. We loved our visit and would definitely stay again!! Perfect location!
This place was wonderful. The linens were top of the line. The bed was so comfortable, I had to ask where they bought it so I can buy myself one.

This cabin exceeded my expectations! It was beautiful, comfortable, and full of surprise amenities. Additionally, the bed and pillows were so comfortable it was hard to get out of bed in the morning. Shellay and Michael were responsive and welcoming hosts and flexible with check in check out time to fit our needs. Only con of the place was the weak wifi signal which made it hard to do remote work, so come in with the expectation of digital detoxing and enjoy the nature around!

My daughter and I visited for one night drop Toronto as we made our way to Forks from Seattle. We instantly fell in love with the cabin we asked to extend our stay. The night was comfortable, the shower from heaven and the kitchen and bathroom stocked so well, with every detail thought of. We drove down to the boat launch late at night and first thing in the morning and saw over 20 deer and heard a rooster in the a.m.
We would be back. Thank you!

We absolutely loved our stay in this cozy, clean, and quiet cabin. It is so nicely furnished and includes so many special amenities from the pancake breakfast fixings to the plethora of games and dvds. The bed is very comfortable and the shower is e tra fun with music, skylight, and rainshower head. Shellay checked in/texted with us each day to see that we had all that we needed and to offer to answer any questions if necessary. We really enjoyed meeting the hosts in person just before our departure, as they are both so friendly and welcoming. We hope to return for a future visit as this is one of the best airbnbs we have ever visited. Thank you Michael and Shellay!!
We had a wonderful stay. The cabin was perfect. Shelley and Michael were very responsive and gave us a lot of tips on where to go in the area.

Impeccable, well appointed, and very comfortable. The hosts thought of every detail and we lacked for nothing while enjoying our stay. The bathroom was particularly well done, including a skylight over the shower looking out at the cedars.
We were a bit disappointed in how far it was from the water and the sea view was fairly minimal, but the place itself was absolutely perfect.
Awesome place with thoughtful details. Our kids loved the s’mores kit. We loved the fire pit and shower skylight.
Nice hosts and a great place! We had a fun time. Really enjoyed the shower area with views of the trees in the skylight

Beautiful and relaxing space! I wanted to get away from the city for my 23rd birthday celebration as I had just finished working a 60 hour week and I could not have picked a better location. Hosts were friendly, communicative, and overall wonderful and the space was exactly as pictured. The bathroom shower had nice water pressure and the bathroom had a Bluetooth speaker! The bed and couch were so comfy my friends and I could’ve probably spent all day just lounging around and napping. I would definitely stay here again, in fact I’ve favorited this Airbnb just in case I find myself needing another trip away from the city. Book it, you won’t regret it!

By far one of the best airbandb experiences!!!! While the space is small, it has everything one might need for a comfortable experience. We stayed with our two boys ages 9 and 12. They were thrilled about all the board games, beach toys, outdoor space to run around, and complimentary s’mores kit and hot chocolate!!!! Check-in and communication were a breeze. The place is less than five minutes from a great beach, which was beautiful to explore even in cooler weather. Proximity to Olympia National Park is a huge bonus, such a majestic area!!! It is slightly outside of town, so about 15 minutes away from stores/restaurants. The surrounding area is very quiet and peaceful…we saw dear and bald eagles close by!!! Every aspect of the cottage was thought out to provide visitors with all they need to enjoy the stay…..sand toys, fire pit with logs ready to go, supply of coffee/tea, bath products, bathrobes, and both beds are extremely comfortable!!

Amazing place! Shellay & Michael thought of everything in this rental. It’s a great home base for your time in the national park. It was very clean, bed was extremely comfortable and they had anything you needed for your stay. The cooler/ice packs for our picnic lunch was a nice touch. The only surprise was that you aren’t really in ‘the woods’. There are trees on one side but you actually face a road. It wasn’t an issue as we were hardly there. We’ll definitely be back!

Cannot say enough about our stay at this airbnb! It was the perfect little getaway. Shellay & Michael have thought of every detail to make this experience exceptional. We travelled with our toddler and I honestly didn't even need to bring anything, they had it all- a crib, booster seat, toys, baby bath, etc. The space was serene and it was lovely to have a home-base to come back to following an epic day of adventuring the Olympic National Park.
Would highly recommend this airbnb to anyone exploring the area.
Thank you again Shellay & Michael for hosting us!

This is by far one of the best airbnbs I’ve ever had the pleasure of staying! It was even nicer than the photos, and had small touches throughout that made the place cozy and relaxing. It was the perfect home base for a few days checking out the national park, lake crescent and the greater forks area. Definitely recommend and hope to be back!

A cozy and relaxing retreat surrounded by large, breathtaking trees and a peaceful landscape. The bed was plush and the space was intimate. Close to the Olympic National Park and Port Angeles. Highly recommend!
What a peaceful and wonderful location. The fire pit on a cold night was such a fun treat. I’ve stayed in places all over the world and I’ve never found a place that was so well equipped !!

Shellay & Michael’s cabin was incredibly special. We escaped Seattle for the weekend to enjoy Olympic National Park and it did not disappoint. They were very kind hosts and checked in to make sure we had everything we needed. The cabin was so cozy and peaceful. It’s obvious they have an eye for detail and went above and beyond to curate the space. A quick drive into the park makes day trips easy. 12/10 for this place. I can’t wait to book it again 🙂
Excellent accommodations and close to some great hikes!

Our stay at the Majestic Cedars was above and beyond what we expected and we wished we could have stayed longer! The place was tastefully decorated, cozy, comfortable, convenient and the hosts have thought of everything; from a s’mores kit, to extra bathrooms essentials, to blankets, condiments, books, relaxing room spray. Basically, anything you could want this place has it. It’s very private and peaceful. You will have to drive into town but it is well worth it and perfect for a weekend (or more! Which I highly recommend) on the Olympic Peninsula.
Thank you Shellay and Michael for a wonderful stay!

This place is amazing! Super comfy and cozy with a luxury feel. Everything was extremely clean and organized and well stocked. There were plush bathrobes and super soft towels and the bed was like a cloud! We absolutely loved our stay here. The location is great-super close to the downtown area (shops & restaurants) and only 3 min drive to the water. One thing to note is the guest house is right next to the main property but they do a great job of making it feel private.
Love it love it can’t get enough of it. I’ll definitely be coming back sometime.

Amazing stay!! So cozy and stocked with amenities that made our weekend even better than we expected. The location is quiet and peaceful and the bed was so comfy! We’ll absolutely come back the next time we take a trip to the peninsula :)

Really enjoyed our stay at Shellay and Michael’s. The space is beautiful and very clean. I loved the cozy robes and as others have mentioned, the bed is very comfortable. The location was perfect for hiking in nearby lake crescent. Would love to stay again.

This was such a relaxing space and Shelley & Michael were so welcoming. We were able to BBQ dinner, relax in the beautiful scenery and the bed was to die for. Would love to come back and again and stay for longer.

This was the second time my wife and stayed here and it was exactly as we remembered. The owners have included so many thoughtful touches, from the wide assortment to coffee, to the insanely comfortable bed and futon.
The interior was spotless and the check out routine was one of the easiest I’ve ever encountered.
Port Angeles is such a hidden treasure and Shelley and Michael’s listing is absolutely a treasure itself. We’ll be making this a yearly visit.
The place is super cute and they stocked it well with tea, cocoa and coffee.

My girlfriend and I absolutely loved our stay here. It was spotless, so quaint and perfect for the two of us. There were amenities everywhere! Between games, DVDs to watch, pillow spray and fluffy bathrobes for the two of us, we were in heaven. Would absolutely recommend and stay again!

My boyfriend and I came here for a short getaway weekend and it exceeded our expectations! The home was very cozy and is a perfect size for 2. The bed was extremely comfortable and the bathroom was very pretty. Thank you Shellay and Michael!

Shellay & Michael's cabin was wonderful and had everything we needed and more! It was clean, well-stocked, comfortable, and felt like home. The king bed was perfect! Every room had personal touches, including a smores kit in the kitchen! Shellay & Michael were responsive & very friendly. I highly recommend your next stay here!

Shellay and Michael had great hospitality. They thought of every little detail that made us feel right at home. We loved going back to a peaceful space after a long hike. We would love to come back. Great hosts, cozy space, beautiful views.
Every detail was perfect
What a great spot!! Felt very homey and high end, the bed was extremely comfortable too! Would definitely stay here again if in the area.
Perfect spot for exploring all around Lake Crescent and Salt Creek area. Cabin had everything and more! cabin was loaded with all the amenities and more, for adults and kids.

Our five nights were fun, relaxing, and full of local options. Shellay & Michael helped us surprise a dear friend who lives close by. We enjoyed the area with drives to Lake Crescent, Forks, Port Gamble, and Poulsbo. The area is rich in history and beauty. And of course, we enjoyed our time dining & shopping in Port Angeles. Their cabin will not disappoint…it is not only as listed, but it is also chocked full of surprising touches to make your stay perfect for you. Great place to unwind and to just enjoy your peaceful stay (including daily deer visits) or whatever soothes your soul.

Shelley and Michael’s home was absolutely perfect. The space felt brand new, was tastefully designed, and comfortable. There were numerous amenities such as a full kitchen and other small touches that make you feel at home. The hosts were extremely responsive and made check in easy. The location was also quiet off of any main roads. I would highly recommend staying with Shelley and Michael when in Port Angeles.

The attention to detail and comfy and inviting-ness of the cabin was unreal. Top five best airbnbs we’ve ever been to! Highly recommend.
The bed was almost too soft and too comfortable. Felt like we were on a cloud. Great bathroom too!

This cabin was so lovely and COZY. The bed was amazing and the pillows were to die for! They had lots of cute things set up for you to use such as makeup remover wipes, coffee, extra toiletries if needed and they also had plenty of towels and such. I loved that they had games & books to find info about nearby hikes. It was a great stay. The only downside- the wifi didn’t work all that great. My phone had no service and the wifi was spotty & didn’t work on my phone all the time and the tv was a bit blurry from wifi connection. Other than that, I CANNOT complain. I would love to come back!

Absolutely beautiful cabin. They clearly invested in making the fixtures modern while keeping a cozy cabin feel.
Location is behind their house, but they put up partitions to seal you away.

Just when I needed some peace and quiet on the Peninsula, I came across Shellay and Michaels' cabin. What a dream! Nestled among the cedars, but close to main roads and the Water, this cabin has everything you'd ever want for a relaxing time, or a base-camp for exploring the Olympics, the Forest or the Peninsula, generally. It was so comfortable and charming, and I felt immediately at peace. I loved having my coffee each morning on the front patio and seeing deer stroll by. I got some of the best sleep I can recall. The bed and furnishings are amazingly comfortable. Thank you Shellay and Michael!

We loved our stay here! It was so incredibly cozy and was located in a great spot for beautiful drives to explore the area. We had such a fun time and the pictures and description were exactly what the cabin had to offer. There was so much attention to detail and overall an amazing weekend.

Such a great stay for my friends and I while I was up visiting the PNW for the first time. Lovely little cabin minutes away from the beach and tucked into some trees. Will absolutely stay again if I can.
Lovely location, immaculate interior and cozy.
What a wonderful cabin! Thoughtfully designed and equipped with lots of fun details. We had a great weekend and only wished we could've stayed longer!

We had a wonderful time during our stay. The cabin is so cozy and has everything that you could need. It’s clean and well kept. There was a family of deer that would walk through the yard every morning while we drank our coffee. We had a very relaxing and peaceful time away from the city.
Shellay and Michael were responsive when we reached out to them. If you’re looking to stay somewhere in this area I’d highly recommend this cabin.

This Airbnb was FANTASTIC. The host had obviously put so much thought into all of the details. It was well stocked, spotlessly clean, very warm and cozy and felt very private. Great location, only about 10-15 min drive to downtown Port Angeles. Just a great stay. Thank you!
Very cozy and hands down the best cabin experience we’ve ever had!
Super cozy, with everything you need for a peaceful getaway. Lots of games to keep our kids entertained. Best for a couple or a small family.
Had a great stay and the view was just as advertised. Would stay here again, thanks!

My friends and I were visiting from CA to hit the different scenic areas of Olympic National Park. We found this Airbnb as the perfect midway point to drive around all the different areas of the park we wanted to visit. The views of the place was AMAZING and it was just the perfect location to do all the exploring we did! We got to watch the sunset while sitting the living room which was super cool! 10/10 recommend staying here for you visit to Port Angeles!!
Awesome place! Would go again anytime, the views of the ocean make it a treasure find
Extremely pleasant and peaceful stay. House was perfectly clean. Jeff was a friendly and responsive host. View from the location was always spectacular.

This place has an amazing view and practically everything you need. We were lucky enough to see the northern lights from the patio. Also, although many people mentioned that the bedroom on the second floor is essentially open, there is a cellular shade that divides the bedroom from other areas to give you more privacy. The ground-floor bedroom's soundproofing isn't perfect. Sometimes you can hear the flushing noise from the bar next door. Other than that, everything is great! Will come back next time.

Jeff’s place has beautiful views and the binoculars were a nice touch! It is right off a main road and next to a wine bar but even in this location, noise was not an issue. Bed was super comfortable. I would stay here again!
Great place to stay!

Jeff's Port Angeles home was a perfect hub for our girl's trip to Victoria, BC and the Olympic National Park. Walking to the ferry was easy and local shops were great! Wide water views from every room that were especially beautiful at night.
Incredible view, Incredible stay! We honestly had so many things planned but just wanted to stay and enjoy the view. You can regularly see the harbor seals swimming by!

Wonderful stay! We loved the view and the abundance of reading materials about the area/ Olympic national park. The binoculars came in handy. Lots of cool birds and sea lions swimming in the harbor!
Place was very clean and had everything we needed for a relaxing and rejuvenating weekend. Primary bed was very comfortable.
Close to town, we were able to walk and grab dinner! It’s right off the main drag, so there was road noise at rush hour, but nothing that got in the way of us relaxing/ sleeping well.
Thanks again Jeff, we’ll be back!

Knowing that weather can be iffy in March, we wanted a place that would be enjoyable rain or shine. Jeff's place definitely delivered! Gorgeous waterfront views from all 3 levels, room to spread out, and walkable to restaurants, shops, the waterfront, etc.
Jeff was great with communication. All the instructions & directions were clear, and we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.
We loved this place, but it is a little quirky and slightly dated. The ground floor bedroom is private, but the master bedroom is open to the main living area (with a partition that we didn't use) and the loft (with a futon, desk, etc.) is also open. This worked for our family with two teens, but may not work if you require more privacy.
Great location! Jeff was really easy to work with and let us check in early. Place was comfortable with a fantastic view.
Amazing ocean view and friendly welcoming
Excellent trip! The views that we are able to see from the rooms are definitely wonderful! The design of kitchen is also great!
Beautiful place. Beautiful view.

Immaculate place with gorgeous views of the sea.. Loft and main floor have huge windows overlooking the water and quite comfortable. Kitchen is fully equipped with everything we needed and the place was so comfortable we didn't feel like going out much - just relaxed inside looking at the sea.
Great place with a beautiful view!
Clean, easy check in. Quick communication when first booked. The easy, unobtrusive Airbnb experience I was looking for this trip. Thank you!
We loved the place and the location. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a comfy place with a great view and great location. Jeff was very friendly and responsive.
Great spot. Well equiped, clean, great location. Wonderful views!

What a beautiful place. I could sit and look out at that view all day. Located just a couple of minutes walk down to the town, you can easily walk to restaurants or the ferry over to Victoria. There is also a wine bar right next door if you’re into that sort of thing. The unit itself is quite spacious and has gorgeous views from every room. We loved this place.

His accommodation was very clean and the view was especially nice. The dishes provided were very clean and varied in different types. We were especially grateful that he showed us around in person. The house was clean and pleasant as if it was newly remodeled, and everything you need was well-equipped. We loved it there very much and would use it again. It was easy to find there and the trails nearby were clean and good. I recommend it to people who need a break. I really liked it there.

The pictures do not do this place justice. The windows and views make this place one of our favorites ever. It’s within walking distance to so many great restaurants and bars and there is an amazing wine bar next door. We had the best time here and will definitely be back. Jeff is a great host, super communicative and helpful.
Fantastic view. Great location. Cozy vibe. Well stocked. Great host. Jeff’s place is great place to get away to!
Great place for a weekend gate away
Nice host. Perfect location (seaside view, downtown Port Angeles). Great place for your money!

As soon as we entered Jeff's place, we were wowed. It was better than the description. The view, the personal touches, and the decor were relaxing and gave a sense of peace. We immediately felt relaxed after a long day of outdoor activities. There are good restaurants and shops within walking distance. We had a great time and would love to come back if we are in the area. As a host, Jeff was very responsive, timely, and detail-oriented. We had all the necessary instructions we needed during our stay.
Jeff was a wonderful host and informed me of any issues and came by to say HI.
Beautiful place, would certainly visit again purely for the stunning view from the place!
The view from the living room was even better than expected! We were able to walk into town for dinner. I wish we were able to stay for more than one night!

Jeff’s place was a joy to stay at! Lots of room for guests, pristine condition with everything you might need while on vacation! To top it off the view from the patio or second level deck was breathtaking! 10 out of 10 recommend, if you are looking for a place to stay in Port Angeles

Jeff’s place was absolutely perfect! It had a beautiful view of the water. Was within walking distance to numerous restaurants and shops. Was so quiet and felt right at home. Everything you could need in an Airbnb.

Great view; great space; great location.
The view was so spectacular it was tempting to just stay in and enjoy it. We loved watching the Coho Ferry arrive and depart. The home had three levels. Ground level had small bedroom, full bath and laundry; 2nd level had kitchen, dining, living room and primary bedroom and full bath —very open floor plan; there was a third level with office space and a futon etc to lounge. Easy for our group to spread out and views on all levels. Being able to easily walk to restaurants and shops and the ferry was a real plus. Would definitely stay again.

Thanks, Jeff, for welcoming us and creating this beautiful space. The views are amazing. The layout of the place makes is very functional for 2 couples to enjoy. We enjoyed the Kokopelli Grill right down the street - easy to walk to - and there were many other attractions easy to walk to from the site.

Great place, recently redone. Roomy, comfortable, with all necessities provided (including good coffee and lots of towels). Only .25 miles to the (few) good restaurants in town; same distance to coastal bike/jog path. Great view from patio and all bedrooms. Nice wine/beer bar right next door. And close to entrance to Olympic National Park.

Our stay at the farm house was top notch! The home and property were beautiful and everything looked just like the pictures. We immediately felt right at home. The house was clean and had all the amenities we needed for our stay. The hosts truly went above and beyond to make this a great place to stay. We would love to return again in the future!
Beautiful land. We ate dinner on the patio and took long walks in the morning. Such a perfect place to stay. The house was warm and welcoming and simple. Which is exactly how we like it!

Quaint farm house located in the foothills of Olympic National Park. Comfortable beds, cute kitchen with all the tools you need to cook your own meals. My family and I fell in love with Port Angeles and while the location of the Farm House is a bit of a drive to the park and Port Angeles, we would stay there again if we go back to PNW.
Easy to find, quiet and beautiful setting. Best for groups up to six people.

Susie had the house stocked with everything we needed and some things that we didn’t think to bring she had available. Fresh cream in fridge, s’mores, tape, scissors, coffee beans, games and movies and kid toys…we had a lovely time and was enjoyable for our family get together…would book again if we are in area :)
Suzie was a wonderful host and the space is great. Beautiful views of the mountains and lots of toys and books for our kids.
We enjoyed the view of the mountains from the back of the home, just beautiful.

Suzie’s place was exactly as described and listed in photos
Away from chaos and with beautiful views of the mountain range was blissful
Historic touch was a pretty amazing experience ,learned so much about the farm
And we were lucky to have deers visiting us in backyard 😊

The area was gorgeous and peaceful! The mountain views were phenomenal! Suzie and Mary were very responsive to inquiries and helped us with local recommendations for farm fresh eggs and other items. Checked out the Agnew local store and it was great!
Beautiful peaceful spot!

This was not only an awesome home to stay in but also a great experience to be out on the farmland and to enjoy the peace and beauty. The animals were fun also :-))
Suzie is A++++ host--friendly, helpful and fun to talk to. And she gives great massages!!
We had everything we needed to stay in the house for 10 days. The kitchen was very well equipped, the beds were super comfy. We also enjoyed sitting out on the back deck and watching the birds--and especially the hummingbird that seems to live out there.
Thank you for everything, Suzie, it could not have been better!!

This AirBnB is an absolute dream. A stunning and easy to get to location, perfect location for hiking and exploring WA, and well stocked entertainment.
We had an amazing time and would absolutely stay here again if we're given the opportunity

Clean and spacious with all necessary amenities. Easy check in, would book again!

Perfect stay for a trip to Olympic National Park.
I live in Seattle and needed somewhere to stay to break up my drive home after visiting Olympic National Park. I also wanted an AirBNB that would be unproblematic due to trying to also secretly plan my proposal.
This stay was everything I needed and beyond for a similar price as the Olympic Inn where I stayed the last time I travelled to Olympic NP. However, this stay was significantly better quality.
(1) The king sized bed is very comfortable; (2) the bathroom was spotless and I love that we had a washer and dryer available; (3) the room itself is spacious, well planned with the sleeping areas, kitchenette, and living area placed in pleasing setting with a wonderful view of the water; (4) The hosts are friendly, thoughtful, and communicative. There isn’t any more debate left to be had. If you’ve come to this review just go ahead and book it. My only regret was not booking for two nights.
Anita offered a lovely stay! The apartment was clean, well furnished, and had lots of personal touches!

My husband and I absolutely loved our stay at this Airbnb. The surrounding area is so incredibly beautiful and provides so much to discover. The Airbnb was so comfortable and provided all the needed essentials. We cannot say how much we loved getting to stay here!

The studio was beautiful and relaxing. It was nice to come back to after a long day in Olympic and all the accommodations we could’ve possibly needed were available to us. The place looked just like the pictures provided. Definitely worth staying in if you want to visit the Port Angeles area!
Absolutely great place! Very clean and cozy. Would stay again in a heart beat.
Everything was perfect. Well anointed -first class!

Antia's home was a lovely place to stay we used it as a jumping off point to explore the national park on Olympic Peninsula. Beautiful home with all of the the amenities you could ask for. My fiancé and I would definitely stay here again!!

PERFECT! Everything you could want or need while traveling (plus more)! Spacious , luxuriously appointed, beautiful, spotless, lovely view, kind hosts, close to Olympic NP, and quiet. Best accommodations we've ever had (hotel or abnb). Loved every minute while staying here and hope to return!

My husband and I stayed at Anita's place for part our 1 year wedding anniversary trip. The stay was peaceful, romantic, and very clean. Spent most of our time at the national park which is very close by. The view from the stay is breathtaking at sunset! We could not be happier with our experience here.

A wonderful view and quiet relaxing neighborhood stay. Anita and Brent were so pleasant and responsive to helping us, even when we needed some materials to repair a personal item. Highly recommend this place!

Anita has anticipated everything you’d want and more for your stay at her comfortable studio.

Enjoyed this location. Quiet neighborhood. Space was nicely arranged, clean and pleasant. Good communication. I would stay again!

We thoroughly enjoyed staying in Anita's place. It is very clean and comfortable. The view of the water from the front windows is so beautiful. I highly recommend staying here. You will not be disappointed.

Really wonderful place to stay about halfway between Port Angeles and Sequim. The place is quiet, cozy, clean and has amazing views. Access to the Olympic Discovery Trail is only a half mile walk. What wonderful, cozy accomodations! This has got to be one of the best airbnb's we have had the pleasure to stay in...clean, quiet, comfortable, well stocked ~ not to mention the personable hosts! God willing, we'll visit again!

Our stay at Brent and Anita's place was extraordinary. Clean, clean, clean! Neat as a pin! All of the little touches added up to a cozy and comfortable stay. We especially enjoyed the electric fireplace and watching the ships pass by on the Straight of San Juan de Fuca from the two large picture windows. Nice, quiet neighborhood. Easy access to Sequim, Port Angeles, Hurricane Ridge, and Lake Crescent. Our daughter slept on the rollaway bed and said it was very comfortable. There was plenty of room for us to spread out and feel like we had our own space. Great value!

Really great spot and super cute on the inside! The only down side was you could hear a good amount from upstairs. Overall they stayed quiet for the most part tho! Loved the robe and shower in general! Plus they gave me a super yummy and cute cookie! I would stay again

I wish I could live at Anita's place full time. Plenty of space, a great view of the water, cute deer hanging around the neighborhood. It's also a short drive from a ton of stuff to do. Anita was great to message back and forth with about when we'd be arriving, a package I had delivered to her house, etc. Definitely stay here!
The perfect oasis by the sea. Everything was spotless and the details well thought out. We would definitely stay here again!
I would definitely stay here again. Great host, incredible place, lots of fun!

Great location. Clean, plenty of kitchen and bath items. Anita and Brent are great on details. Lots of info about the area is there. About ten minutes from Sequim and Port Angeles as well as the entrance to the Olympic National Park and Hurricane. Wonderful place to stay.

My husband and I are so happy we booked with Anita! Our honeymoon to the Olympic National Park was that much better staying in this tucked away, cute place. The location is great, quiet neighborhood, right next to beautiful cliffs and a gorgeous view of the ocean. It's super close to neighboring towns and scenic spots too. Since Anita and Brent live above the studio, they are easy to get in touch with and have tons of recommendations for the area. With that, they respected our space and privacy. I've never had such accommodating hosts with airbnb, and highly recommend staying here!
Comfortable, quiet, spacious, well appointed, with hosts that were gracious. Neighborhood afforded nice views of sunsets.

This place is a gem and well worth the money! Very cozy and tha host pays attention to details like providing robes . Quiet neighborhood with lots of place s to walk and hike. We would live there we felt so comfortable !!!
Anita and Brent’s house is gorgeous with a beautiful ocean view. We had an amazing stay - our hosts were accommodating, and the place has everything you need for a few days. Highly recommend it.
We loved the location and recommendations. Thank you!
Scenic and quiet location; very pretty digs with well-equipped kitchen; Anita was a very communicative, thoughtful and understanding host!

Great place. Everything needed is available, coffee, tea, microwave, fridge, etc. Tons of tourist info. We didn’t stay in the room much because there is so much to see outside. It was very clean and welcoming. The view is great with the barges and BC on the other side. Even met their puppy on her terms. They do live above, but they were very quiet and it did not bother us in the least.
Best place to stay at. You’ll have the most amazing view!

Anita’s place was charming, warm, cozy and super comfortable. I have a feeling our host is just like that! She responded quickly and also put a lot of small touches into her place that made our stay really beautiful.
Anita’s place is super-clean, very quiet, and close to activities in Sequim and Port Angeles. We loved it!!
Great place. Very well set for short visit to Port Angeles or a week long staycation / WFH. Definitely recommend.

We had a wonderful time at Eagle’s Rest. Big comfy bed, cozy fireplace, surprisingly well-equipped kitchenette and an ideal location for peninsula adventures - equidistant between Sequim and Port Angeles (15 mins) and an easy drive to ONP spots like Hurricane Ridge (45 mins) and Lake Crescent (45 mins). Anita was a responsive, lovely host and we so appreciated our stay!

Such a beautiful and spotlessly clean studio to stay in. Initially we were going to go with a spot in Port Angeles, but since this place looked so perfect we went with it. Would stay there again. Was only a few minutes from Port Angeles, however was quieter almost country setting w/ nice view and cozy fireplace. If your have some doubt try it out. My takeaway is how great of a value this Airbnb is! It’s a very spacious, clean and well appointed unit with a nice view of the Salish Sea. The owners are very communicative and helpful. A far better spot than any hotel in the area. I highly recommend this Airbnb to folks visiting the Olympic Peninsula!
Cozy spot in a convenient location! Will stay here again!

Anita's place was clean, cozy, and well stocked. Location is about half way between Sequim and Port Angeles, about 15 mins from historical downtown of Port Angeles. Place also has a lovely view. Anita was welcoming and easy to communicate with.
This place is a gem! Exceeded our expectations!
Anita and Brent are truly amazing hosts! They have thought of everything to make their place comfortable! I recommend this Airbnb to everyone!

If you're looking for comfort, cleanliness, quiet, and an amazing location, then you've found it right here, between Sequim and Port Angeles! This charming suite has everything you need for your little getaway. Lovely views of Juan de Fuca Strait are icing on the cake!

Anita's place has all that you will need for a good night's rest and peace between your adventures. She was great at communicating and the room/apt. is very nice, clean and comfortable. I would recommend this stay.

Perfect! Best Airbnb I’ve stayed in. Beautiful view, spacious and clean, wonderful directions, incredibly comfortable, great location for exploring (I loved that it was right in between Sequim and Port Angeles as well as its proximity to the local and national parks), and a very kind host with excellent recommendations (Nourish and Granny’s were in fact delicious)! I loved watching the deer in the mornings. Hope to return!
Cozy spot with lovely views in a great location! Such a fun place to stay while visiting Olympic!

The neighborhood is quiet, clean, and picturesque. We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip to Port Angeles.
This was a lovely stay. Its was quiet and cozy. The place was super clean and the bed was extra comfy. Great location to visit Olympic National Park!

The hosts and their dog live above the studio, so we occasionally heard footsteps, but for the most part it was very quiet (we actually could have used a fan at night for some white noise so we didn’t hear each other!)
Since this stay was at the end of our trip, the one bedroom studio for three of us did start to feel a little small after a couple of days, but we were gone so much enjoying what the area head to offer that we were really only there for sleeping!
There is a great paved trail nearby for running or biking.
Beautiful location and s very nice clean apartment!!!
This is the perfect place to stay! Quiet, comfortable and convenient with lots of extras if you forget something. We plan to return next year and hope to stay here again.
Wonderful Stay!

Great place to stay door the weekend while we visited and hiked the National Park. Comfy bed, cozy living space, and communication was great. This place is a cosy little gem! Close to Olympic National Park, Port Angeles and Sequim, it’s a great spot to come back to after a day of hiking/kayaking. Charming, comfortable, practical: everything you need!
We had everything we needed and enjoyed our stay in the beautiful area. All went well.

This is hands down the nicest place I’ve stayed through Airbnb. It’s comfortable, attractively decorated, and Anita has thought of literally every thing a traveler might need. Even slippers and beach towels!

DO NOT STAY WITH THIS HOST! My 1st bad Airbnb review. Facts: I gave her 2hr notice when I would arrive. She did not heat the RV for me. I had to search for 1 tiny space heater. Upon arrival, it was 50deg in the RV. She told me that it would warm up with both heaters on high. It never got warmer than 53 deg, and the water ran dry due to frozen pipes. I used my own water that I brought, in order to use the toilet properly (you have to fill it with water before using, or it will be very dirty.) I brought lots of warm clothing. I got very little sleep. I left the place spotless as I always do. There was never any hot water, even after the place warmed up with the sun the next day. No shower. Not enough TP provided. I left early and asked for a refund, which she agreed to. Both host and Airbnb get an F, since I had to beg for a refund, which I have not seen, 2 wks later. I am told I may get 30%. Unbelievable. Airbnb can't be trusted to advocate for guests. This host should be removed.
